title: Ayeyi Nka Nyame Tumfo
markdown:
**1**   
Ayeyi nka Nyame Tumfo   
ade ny'naa so Hene!   
O, me kra yi N'ayɛ, n'ɔyɛ   
W'ahoɔden ne nkwagye;   
Mo a mote ny'naa,   
Muntwiw mmra N'asɔrefi;   
Momfa anigye ntontom No.

 **2**   
Ayeyi nka Nyame a Odi   
Ade ny'naa so Hene!   
ɔde Ne ntaban bɔ w'ho ban   
Mma wo nea ehia wo!   
Enti wunhui,   
Sɛ ɔde w'abisade ny'naa   
Ama w'sɛnea Wahyehyɛ no?

 **3**   
Ayeyi nka Nyame a Ohy'ra   
W'adwuma, bɔ w'ho ban;   
N'ayamye ne N'ahummɔb'rɔ nni   
W'akyi da biara; Susu ho bio,   
Nea Tweaduampɔn tumi yɛ,   
Sɛ ɔde Ne dɔ fa w'yɔnko.

title: Yɛn Nyame Hen'Abɔde Ny'naa
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛn Nyame Hen' abɔde ny'naa   
Momma mo nne so mma yɛnto   
Haleluya, Haleluya!   
Owia fɛfɛ a ɛhyerɛn,   
ɔsram a ɛma hann 'nadwo!

 **Nnyeso**   
Munyi N'ayɛ, munyi N'ayɛ,   
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya!

 **2**   
Ahum a etu, mframa brɛoo,   
Mununkum ā ɛde mframa nam;   
Munyi N'ayɛ, Haleluya!   
Anɔpa, di dɛw 'nigye mu;   
Anwumm're hann, ma wo nne so;

 **3**   
Nɔsu kronnyen a ɛresen,   
Monto dwom mma mo Aw'rade!   
Munyi N'ayɛ, Haleluya!   
Ogya a ɛhyerɛn fɛfɛ,   
Na ɛma yɛn hyew ne kanea;

 **4**   
Ma 'bɔde ny'naa nhy'ra ɔbɔadeɛ,   
Nsom No wɔ ahobrɛase mu!   
Munyi N'ayɛ, Haleluya!   
Munyi Agya, ɔba ayɛ!   
Ne Honhom no! Baasa K'ro no!

title: Nyame Wɔ Yɛn Mu Ha
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame wɔ yɛn mu ha   
Momma yɛnkoto No,   
Na yɛmfa suro mmra N'anim;   
Nyame wɔ yɛn mu ha,   
Me kra nyɛ komm N'anim   
Mmɛn No wɔ ahobrɛase mu!   
Ne de a Munim No,   
Monsom No nokwarem'   
Munyi No ayɛ yie.

 **2**   
Bra na bɛtra me  mu,   
Me kra te sɛ Maria,   
Nyɛ Wo wiase asɔrefie.   
Bra me mu, O Honhom,   
Sesa nipadua yi,   
Mede 'nidi, dɔ, bɛma Wo   
Baabiarā a,Mɛkɔ no,   
Ma menkoto W'anim,   
Nɔhu Wo yie nsom Wo.

 **3**   
Wiase nnaadaa hunu,   
Ahantan, 'bra bɔne,   
Yɛde 'nigye gyae ne ny'naa mu.   
'Wura, yɛde 'nigye   
Bɛyɛ Wo de daa daa   
Yɛn kra, nkwa, ne yɛn adeny'naa   
Wo nkutoo, Na yenim,   
Woyɛ ade ny'naa Wura   
Woky'rɛ nokwar' 'bra kwan.

title: Me Kra Yi Soro Hen' Ayɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Me kra yi soro Hen' ayɛ,   
Fa wo tow no bra N'anim;   
Wapɔn wo, de wo ho akyɛ w'   
Ͻnsɛ sɛ wuyi N'ayɛ?   
Yi No ayɛ, yi No ayɛ!   
Yi daa Hene no ayɛ!

 **2**   
Yi N'ayɛ, ɔkyerɛɛ Ne dom,   
Agyanom ahohia mu;   
Yi n'ayɛ na ɔnsakra da;   
ɔtea nyaa, ɔyɛ ntɛm hy'ra:   
Yi No ayɛ, yi No ayɛ!   
ɔyɛ 'nuonyamfo ampa!

 **3**   
ɔhwɛ yɛn so sɛ agya pa,   
Onim yɛn mm'rɛwyɛ nyinaa;   
ɔsoa yɛn Ne basa so brɛoo,   
Gye yɛn fi y'atamfo nsam:   
Yi no ayɛ, yi No ayɛ!   
Sɛnea Ne dom sian ba no!

 **4**   
Abɔfo mmoa yɛn N'ayeyi m'   
Mo na muhu n'anim daa;   
'Wia ne'sram, monkoto N'anim,   
Nea 'Indeɔ ny'naa yi N'ayɛ:   
Yi No ayɛ, yi No ayɛ!   
Yi Nyame domfo N'ayɛ!

title: M'anidaso Ny'naa Ne Nyame
markdown:
**1**   
M'anidaso ny'naa ne Nyame;   
ɔhyɛ m'ahotoso den,   
ɔhwɛ me so akwan ny'naa mu   
'Ma me nea eye nkutoo.   
Nyankopɔn nko ara   
Ná ɔgye m' koma yɛ Ne de.

 **2**   
Nipa 'hantan ne fam 'nuonyam,   
Nkrantɛ ne kyɛw di n' huammɔ;   
Nea osiam ho fif'ri hyehyɛ,   
Abanten ny'naa dwiri gu.   
Nso Nyame tumi no   
Ne m'abanten b're biara.

 **3**   
Onyame yieyɛ tim hɔ daa,   
Ne nyansa mu dɔ kɛse;   
'Nuonyam, hann ne nkwa wɔ Ne ho;   
Ahoɔfɛ senŋ fi Ne mu.   
ɔdɔ wɔ Ne nsā ano,   
Ahosɛpɛ tie Ne fre.

 **4**   
Ma onipa mmɔ ayeyi   
Afɔre mma Nyame daa;   
Ayeyi mforo nkɔ s'ros'ro,   
Ne Ba Kristo 'kyɛde n' nti.   
Kristo frɛ obiara:   
Mo 'kyidifo munnhintiw.

title: O Monsom Aw'rade 'Hokeka
markdown:
**1**   
O Monson Aw'rade 'hokeka   
kronkron mu,   
Monkoto N'anim,   
monka N'ayeyi   
Wɔ setie fɛfɛ ne   
'hobrɛase huanhuam mu.   
Koto N', yi N'ayɛ,   
Ne din ne 'W'rade.

 **2**   
Fa w'adesoa ne dadwen gu   
Ne nan ase,   
ɔbɛsoa ne ny'naa   
wɔ Ne koma so;   
ɔbɛkyekye wo werɛ   
atie wo mpaebɔ,   
Ahwɛ w'anammɔn   
de asi neā eye.

 **3**   
Nsuro, fa w'ade   
ketewa ne w'ahonya,   
Sɛ ɛte biara,   
bra N'abangua so   
Nokwar' a ɛsɔ ani   
ne 'hobrɛase dɔɔ   
'Yinom sɛɛ na   
fa bɔ No afɔre.

 **4**   
Sɛ mpo yɛde ba   
'hopopo ne sųro mu a   
ɔbɛgye wɔ Ne din   
a ɛsom bo m'   
Anɔpa 'nigye wie   
anwumm're nusu mu   
'Hopopo ne sųro   
wie 'nidaso mu.

title: Aw'rade Di Hen' Sion
markdown:
**1**   
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,   
Ma wiase ny'naa nni dɛw,   
Momfa ahurusi koma   
Mmra Ne dom 'henguá anim;   
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,   
N'ayeyi bɛwoso;   
Ahen' mma bɛkoto N'anim,   
Ná ahen' ahyɛ N' 'nuonyam.

 **2**   
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,   
Hena ná ɔne No sɛ?   
Wiase abun' ny'naa wɔ Ne nsam',   
Odi po kɛse so;   
Monhyɛ Ne din anuonyam   
Na munhim Ne frankaa;   
Kosi sɛ nsupɔw ny'naa benya   
Ne nkwagye tumi no.

 **3**   
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,   
Saa mm're yi yɛ Ne de;   
Monhyɛn' N'asɔrefi no mu,   
Na nnwonto nhyɛ hɔ ma;   
N'adehye frankaa n'ase   
Abɔde ny'naa nkoto,   
Momma S'ro ne 'sase Hen' so   
Nhyɛ N'ade ny'naa so Hen'

title: Yebom Hyia Bisa Awurade Hɔ
markdown:
**1**   
Yebom hyia bisa   
Awurede hɔ nhyira,   
ɔtwe y'aso yɛ ntɛm   
ma yehu Ne pɛ;   
'Bɔnefo a ɔhyɛ yɛn   
so no gyae yɛn haw.   
Monkamfo Ne din no,   
Ne w'rɛ mfi Ne de.

 **2**   
Yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ yɛn   
nkyɛn rekyerɛ yɛn kwan;   
ɔde Ne soro   
ahemman no tim hɔ;   
'Nti yefi ase di nim   
wɔ 'ko no mfiase;   
Aw'rade wɔ y'afa;   
'Nuonyam ny'naa wɔ No.

 **3**   
Yɛma Wo din so,   
kannifo nkonimdifo;   
Yɛsrɛ sɛ kɔ so yɛ yɛn   
Banbɔfo daa.   
Ma W'asafo no nguan   
mfi ahohia ny'naa mu,   
Yɛkamfo Wo din, W'ra   
Ma yɛn fawhodi.

title: Ma Wiase Nnipa Nyinaa Nto
markdown:
**1**   
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sɛ:   
Me Nyame Hen'!   
S'ro nni akyi koraa,   
N'ayeyi bɛfro hɔ;   
'Sase nni fam mm'roso,   
N'ayeyi fi hɔ ba.   
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sɛ:   
Me Nyame Hen'!

 **2**   
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sɛ:   
Me Nyame Hen'!   
Asafo no mmɔ 'se   
Hwee ntumi nsi wɔn kwan;   
Nea ɛkyɛn so, koma   
Nso yɛ n'afa mu de:   
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sɛ:   
Me Nyame Hen'!

title: Kristofo Mmom' Nto Dwom
markdown:
**1**   
Kristofo mmom' nto dwom, Haleluya, Amen!   
Ayeyi nka Kristo; Haleluya, Amen!   
Ma koma ne nne ny'naa   
Nni dɛw N'agua anim;    
Ayeyi na ɔpɛ, Haleluya, Amen!

 **2**   
Momma mo koma so, Haleluya, Amen!   
Ma 'yeyi nhyɛ s'ro ma, Haleluya, Amen!   
Yɛn yɔnko Kwanky'rɛfo   
Brɛ Ne hō ase ma yɛn;   
Ne dɔ to rentwa da, Haleluya, Amen!

 **3**   
Munyi Kristō ayɛ bio, Haleluya, Amen!   
Nnyigyei no rensa ha, Haleluya, Amen!   
S'ro 'somdwoe mpoano hɔ   
Yɛkamfo Ne yieyɛ;   
Yɛbɛto dwom daa daa, Haleluya, Amen!

title: Kamfō Abraham Nyame
markdown:
**1**   
Kamfō Abraham Nyame,   
Nea Odi hen' s'ro no;   
ɔyɛ Tetekwaframoa   
ne ɔdo Nyame;   
Yehowa! Meara no!   
ɔs'ro ne 'sase ntie;   
Mekoto hy'ra din kronkron no,   
Nhy'ra nka No daa.

 **2**   
Kamfō Abraham Nyame,   
Nea N'ahyɛde mu no,   
Mesɔr' hwehwɛ 'niká a ɛwɔ   
Ne nifa no,   
Enti mepow wiase,   
Nyansa, din ne tumi;   
ɔno ne me kyɛfa,   
me kyɛm, M'abankɛse.

 **3**   
Mo nkonim dɔm nyinaa,   
Monna s'ro Nyamč ase;   
Wɔteam daa sɛ: Mo! Agyā,   
ɔba, Honhom Kronkron;   
Mo ne s'ro bom to sɛ:   
Mo! Abraham Nyame,   
Tumi, kɛseyɛ, ne nkamfo   
Yɛ Wo de daa

title: Yɛde 'Hosɛpɛ Kamfo Wo
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛde 'hosɛpe kamfo Wo.   
Anuonyam ne do Nyame;   
Komam bue sɛ nhwiren W'anim,   
Ma Wo so sɛ s'ro owia:   
Nan bɔn' ne w'rɛhow mununkum,   
Pam akyinnye sum fi hɔ;   
Wo a Woma daa anigye,   
Fa 'dekyee hann hyɛ yɛn ma.

 **2**   
Wo nnwuma twa W' ho hyia 'nigyem;   
'Sase ne s'ro yi W' hann ky'rɛ.   
Ns'romma ne 'bɔfo to dwom ky'rɛW'   
Ayeyi dwom a ɛnsa.   
Mfuw ne kwae, bonhwa ne nkoko,   
Nhwiren fɛfɛ, po 's'rɔkyc,   
'Nomaa su ne 'subɔnten sen,   
Frɛ sɛ  yenni dɛw Wo mu.

 **3**   
Woma kwa de bɔne nso kyɛ,   
Woma nhy'ra daa, Hyirafo,   
ɔbra mu anigye nsuti,   
Homč a 'mu dɔ sɛ po bun'!   
Wo, Agya, ne Kristo yɛn Nuaɔ   
Wɔn a wɔte dɔ mu wɔW':   
Ky'rɛ yɛn sɛ yɛbɛdɔ yɛn ho,   
Ma yɛn so kɔ s'ro dɛw mu.

title: Nnwom Foforo Na Monto
markdown:
**1**   
Nnwom foforo na monto mma No,   
Nea Wayɛ anwanwade no.   
ɔdɔ di hen' wɔ daa 'nuonyam mu:   
Mommɛkamfo Otumfo no.   
Wama wɔahu Ne nkwagne kɛsɛn',   
N'adofo ny'naa di ho 'h'rusi:   
Wayi Ne daa trenee no adi   
Wɔ amanaman ny'naa anim.

 **2**   
Ah'rusi ne 'hosɛpɛ kɛsɛm',   
Ma sanku ne ɛnne biara   
Nto dom a abu so ho 'yeyi,   
Sɛ wiase ny'naa nni ah'rusi.   
Momfa torobɛnto ne sanku   
Nto dwom mma ɔsoro nnyigye.   
Asase ne po mu nneɛma ny'naa   
Monto dwom mma mo Hen' kɛse n'.

 **3**   
Nsuten ne po a ɛreworo,   
Monhyɛ Aw'rade anuonyam.   
Mmepɔ ne mmotan nso monsɔre,   
Monto dwom nyi Ne din ayɛ.   
Trenee, mudi ne 'nuonyam wɔ No,   
Ayeyi bɛyɛ Ne de daa.   
Yɛn Nyame tene, Nea Ne nokwar'   
De wiase tim hɔ asomdwoe m'.

title: Momma Yɛnkamfo 'W'rade Din
markdown:
**1**   
Momma yɛnkamfo 'W'rade din   
monhyɛN' 'nuonyam, Amen.   
Amen, amen.   
Amen, amen.

 **2**   
Monkɔ wiase 'fanan nyinaa   
Haleluya, Amen.   
Amen, amen.   
Amen, amen.

title: Me Bɔfo Ne Me Hen'
markdown:
**1**   
Me Bɔfo ne me Hen',   
Nea mewɔ ny'naa fi Wo,   
W'ayamyč a enni kabea nom',   
Na me nhyira ny'naa fi;   
W'ayamyč a enni kabea nom',   
Na me nhyira ny'naa fi.

 **2**   
Wo nsā ano abɔde,   
Mete ase Wo mu;   
Me Nyankopɔn,   
W'adɔe dɔɔso Boro m'ayeyi so;   
Me Nyankopɔn,   
W'adɔe dɔɔso Boro m'ayeyi so.

 **3**   
Wura dɛn na mɛma,   
B'rč a ade ny'naa yɛ W' de?   
Wo dɔ no fata m'aseda,   
Nanso ɛnsɔ ani;   
Wo dɔ no fata m'aseda,   
Nanso ɛnsɔ ani.

 **4**   
O fa s'ro ahoɔden   
Bra bɛkanyan me kra;   
Ma asɛm ne ɔpɛ biara,   
Me nna ny'naa nyɛ Wo de;   
Ma asɛm ne ɔpɛ biara,   
Me nna ny'naa nyɛ Wo de.

title: Mo Nnipa a Mote Wiase
markdown:
**1**   
Mo nnipa a mote wiase,   
Mommɔ ose mma Aw'rade;   
Monsom No 'nigyem' nyi N'ayɛ,   
Mummedi ah'rusi N'anim.

 **2**   
Aw'rade ne Nyame ampa;   
Cbɔɔ yɛn b'rɛ a yen mmoa nnim.   
Yɛyɛ Ne nk'rɔfo, ɔyɛn yɛn;   
Na ɔfa yɛn sɛ Ne nguammaa.

 **3**   
Momfa 'yeyi nhyɛn' N'apon mu,   
Momfa dɛw mmra N'abangua so   
Monkamfo, nhyira Ne din daa,   
Efisɛ saa na ɛfata.

 **4**   
Senti a yɛn Nyame ye ni:   
N'ahummɔb'rɔ tim hɔ daa daa;   
Ne nokwar' tim hɔ mm're nvinaa m'   
Na ebegyina nnasanten.

title: Abɔde Ne Soro Wura
markdown:
**1**   
Abɔde ne soro Wura,   
Owia yi W'anuonyam adi:   
Wone abrabɔ nnyinaso,   
Wobɛn koma dɔfo biara.

 **2**   
Yɛn nkwa Awia, Wo nkwa hann no,   
Hy'rɛn ma egyigye yɛn kwan so;   
Yɛn 'nidaso ns'romma, Wo hann   
Kyekye yɛn werɛ dasu mu.

 **3**   
W'anim hintaw a sum d'ru yɛn,   
Wo pue yɛ yɛn owigyinae;   
Nyankontɔn, Wo dom sɛnky'rɛnne:   
Ade nyinaa wɔ W', gye bɔne!

 **4**   
Fam ne s'ro nkwa nyinaa Wura,   
Wo hann yɛ nokware ne dɔ;   
Wo hann ahengua no anim,   
Yɛnhwehwɛ yɛn ankasa hann.

 **5**   
Fa Wo nokware no dom yɛn,   
Gye koma a ɛhwehwɛ Wo yi.   
Na W'afɔremuka nyinaa   
Nyɛ kronkron sɛ ogyaframa.

title: O, 'Nɔpa Ns'romma a Wohy'rɛn
markdown:
**1**   
O, 'nɔpa ns'romma a Wohy'rɛn   
Wɔ Nyame nokwar' ne hann mu!   
Wode mmɔborɔhun' hy'rɛn!   
Yakob aseni, Dawid Ba,   
Yɛn Awurade, Woaka yɛn   
Koma sɛ yɛnsom Wō ara!   
ɔdwo, Kronkron! tumi 'nuonyam,   
Nkonim wɔ Wo, Woma nhyira   
Wo na tumi ny'naa wɔ Wo nsam.

 **2**   
W'ra, sɛ Wode dɔ hwɛ yɛn a,    
Ahotɔ fi Nyamč anim s'ro   
Sian ba yɛn so ntɛm ara.   
W'Asɛm, Honhom, honam, mogya,   
De s'ro aduan dwudwo yɛn kra.   
Wone yɛn agyapade!   
W'ahummɔbr'ɔ mmɛkanyan yɛn;   
O twi bɛn yɛn! Yɛn ky'rɛky'rɛfo,   
S'ro dɔ nam Wo sō aba yɛn so.

 **3**   
Agya Tumfo, Wo Ba no mu   
Wodɔɔ yɛn b're a 'sase yi,   
Wonnya ntoo ne fapem no!   
Wo Ba no de dɔ apɔn yɛn   
Sɛ yɛntra Ne mu ha ne s'ro:   
'Yi ne Wo nkwagye kɛse n'   
Haleluya! ɔteasefo   
Kristo no ama yɛn daa nkwa,   
Na ɔrenni yɛn huammɔ da.

 **4**   
O ma nsanku mma wɔn nne so!   
Na dwom nkyerɛ yɛn ah'rusi,   
B'rč a yɛn nne gyigye wom no,   
'Fisɛ Kristo ka yɛn ho daa,   
Ͻnnɛ, ɔkyena, da biara!   
Ne dɔ no to rentwa da.   
Monto dwom den, ahosɛpɛm',   
Ahurusi! Monka 'sɛm no!   
Anuonyam Hen' no yɛ kɛse.

title: Monto Dwom Fof'ro Mma
markdown:
**1**   
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade,   
Na Wayɛ 'nwanwade;   
Ne nifa ne basa kronkron   
Adi nim ama No.

 **2**   
Momfa sanku ne dwonto nne   
Nto dwom mma Yehowa;   
Momfa t'robɛnto ne mmɛnta   
Nkamfo yɛn Hen' 'W'rade.

 **3**   
Ma po ne ne mayɛ nworo,   
Wiase ne 'mutefo;   
Ma nsu akɛse mmɔ wɔn nsam   
Mmepɔ mmom' nni 'h'rusi.

 **4**   
Monhwɛ 'W'radč anim:   
ɔreba Abebu wiasč atɛn;   
Obebu wiasč atɛntrenee   
Ne man pɛpɛyɛ mu.

title: Munyi 'W'radè Ayɛ!
markdown:
**1**   
Munyi 'W'radè ayɛ! Munyi N'ayɛ s'ro,   
Mommɔ 'se N'asɛm mu hann abɔfo;   
Mo s'rofo, monkamfo Nea ɔbɔɔ mo no   
Na monsom wɔ N'anim, Hann ahoɔfɛ mu.

 **2**   
Munyi 'W'radè ayɛ! Yi N'ayɛ fam ha,   
Wɔ nne dɛdɛ mu: Mò awo fof'ro mma   
Nea ɔde dom fi s'ro n', Munyi No ayɛ;   
Nea munim Ne dɔ no, Munyi No ayɛ.

 **3**   
Munyi 'W'radè ayɛ! Nea 'gyigye nyinaa,   
Sankuhan biara, mma ne nnyigyei so;   
Sanku a ano yɛ den, Nkyerɛ N'anuonyam,   
Na sankuten nso nka Nea Wayɛ nkyerɛ.

 **4**   
Munyi 'W'radè ayɛ! Aseda ne dwom   
Na momfa mma No, Nnasanten nyinaa,   
Ne dɔ wɔ adeɔm', Ne s'ro kyɛde nti.   
Nɔkwagye dom no nti, Munyi 'W'radè ayɛ.

title: Nyame K'ro a Womporɔ Na Wonhu Wo
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame k'ro a Womporɔ na wonhu Wo   
Wo a Wote hann a yentumi nhu mu,   
Wɔahy'ra Wo, 'Nuonyamfo, Tetekwaframoa,   
'Tumfo nkonimdifo, yɛkamfo Wo din.

 **2**   
Wonhome, Wompep're, Woyɛ komm sɛ hann;   
Ͻnka Wo b'ribiara, Wode tum' di hen';   
W'atɛntrenee te sɛ mmepɔ. ɛk'rɔn sen'   
Mununkum a ɛma yiedi ne dɔ no.

 **3**   
Akɛse ne nkumaa ny'naa, Woma wɔn nkwa;   
Wote ase daa, nokwar' nkwa wɔ Wo mu;   
Yɛyɛ prɔmprɔm te sɛ nhaban wɔ dua so,   
Yɛtete gu, yera, na Wonsakra da.

 **4**   
'Nuonyam Agya Tumfo, Hann Agya Kronkron,   
W'abɔfo kata wɔn anim kamfo Wo;   
Yebeyi Wo ayɛ: boa yɛn ma yenhu   
Sɛ anuonyam hann na ɛde Wo hinta.

title: Nyame Ne Yɛm Dwom
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame ne yɛn dwom, na obiara a   
Oyi N'ayɛ nya 'hoɔden ne home.   
Wɔn a wɔde dɛw yi Nyame ayɛ;   
San de nyansa a yɛhwere ma yɛn,   
San de nyansa a yɛhwere ma yɛn.

 **2**   
Nyame ne yɛn dwom, Yesu bɛgye yɛn:   
Yɛde yɛn ho ma Wo, yɛn nkamfo mu.   
Yɛn nyinaa ka bom, to dwom foforo.   
Yesu di y'anim kɔ s'ro hann no mu,   
Yesu di y'anim kɔ s'ro hann no mu.

 **3**   
'Yi ne dwom a 'haw bi ntumi nhyɛ so,   
Nyame ayeyifo pow abufuw;   
ɔdɔ ne ehu dwom sononko a,   
Nyame de siesie asase hunu,   
Nyame de siesie asase hunu.

 **4**   
Nyame ne yɛn kommyɛ b'rč a yɛnto dwom;   
Aw'rɛhow ma yentumi nto dwom a,   
Yɛde gyidi yɛ setie kommyɛ mu,   
Kosi sɛ yɛn 'yeyi nne bɛsɔr' bio,   
Kosi sɛ yɛn 'yeyi nne bɛsɔr' bio.

title: Ahurusi Dɔn Rewosow
markdown:
**1**   
Ahurusi dɔn rewosow,   
Mo mmepɔ nyi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Yɛn koma sɔre sɛ nnomaa,   
Mo mmepɔ nyi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Yɛn ahurusi bere no   
Twe adɔfo nyinaa ba;   
Yɛde yɛn nne dɛdɛ to dwom:   
Mo mmepɔ nyi Wradč ayɛ!

 **2**   
Yɛn fi yɛ dɛ sen' baabiara;   
Nea mmepɔ yi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Na yɛn dadwen ny'naa tu yera,   
Nea mmepɔ yi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Yenim sɛ Kristo yɛn Nua no   
De hama kyeky're yɛn bom;   
Ne na Maria na ɔwoo No,   
Nea mmepɔ yi 'W'radč ayɛ!

 **3**   
Afč aso, yɛn ntade fitaa,   
Mo mmepɔ nyi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Yɛde asomdwoe kyea yɛn ho,   
Mo mmepɔ nyi 'W'radč ayɛ!   
Yen ny'naa kyɛ Onyame yieyɛ;   
Yedidi gyae akodi,   
Yen bukyia ny'naa ma 'sɛky'rɛnne,   
Mo mmepɔ nyi 'W'radč ayɛ!

title: Nsoromma Biara Bɛto Dwom
markdown:
**1**   
Nsoromma biara bɛto dwom;    
'Bɔde 'kɛse ne nkumaa;   
Mommra mmɛkamfo s'ro Hen' no,    
Wɔ din biarā a minim mu.

 **Nnyeso**   
S'ro Nyame, fam Nipa;   
Kronkron ne din a minim.

 **2**   
B're a 'bɔde nyinaa Hen' no,   
Wɔwoo No 'sase so no,   
Na nipadua no yɛ kronkron,   
Na awo no yɛ kronkron.

 **3**   
Nsoromma ahorow nyinaa,    
'Bɔde 'kɛse ne nkumaa;   
Mommra mmɛkamfo s'ro Hen' no,   
Wɔ din biarā a munim mu.

title: Munyi Aw'rade Ayɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Munyi Aw'rade ayɛ, Haleluya!   
'Hotefō a mowɔ fam ha, Haleluya!   
S'ro 'hengua ho abɔfo, Haleluya!   
Wɔn a wonim Ne dɔ no, Haleluya!

 **2**   
S'ro ne asase nka mmom', Haleluya!   
Wɔnka N'anwanwade nky'rɛ, Haleluya!   
Mm're nyinaa ne mmaa nyinaa, Haleluya!   
Munyi No ayɛ daa daa, Haleluya!

 **3**   
Munyi N'ayɛ mpɛ Ne dom, Haleluya!   
Monkamfo Ne dom nhyehyɛe, Haleluya!   
Nea Wayɛ ama nnipa, Haleluya!   
Nea ɔnam Ne Ba so ma, Haleluya!

title: Monkamfo Aw'rade, S'rofo
Mo a Mo Komam Tew
markdown:
**1**   
Mo a mo komam tew,   
Munni dɛw, monto dwom,   
Momma frankaa no so wɔ wim,   
Kristo asɛnnua no.

 **Nnyeso**   
Di dɛw! Di dɛw!   
Momfa nnaase nto dwom!

 **2**   
Momma mo nne so den   
Sɛ po 's'rɔkye 'yeyi,   
Monto dwom a efi tete,   
Tete mm're mu nnwom no.

 **3**   
S'ro 'bɔfo nnwontofo,   
'Sase so 'hotefo,   
Momfa dɛw nto ah'rusi dwom   
Nokwar' 'hosɛpɛ mu.

 **4**   
ɔbra kwantu yi mu,   
Monkɔ so nto dwom daa;   
Mmofra, mpanyin, awia, 'nadwo,   
'Nigye ne mmusu mu.

 **5**   
Munyi s'ro Hen' ayɛ,   
W'ra a yɛsom No no;   
Agya, ɔba, Honhom Kronkron,    
Nyame teasefo no.

title: Momma Yenyi Aw'rade Ayɛ
Monto 'Yeyi Dwom Mma
markdown:
**1**   
Monto 'yeyi dwom mma s'ro hen',   
Abɔde ny'naa Nyame no,   
Nyame Tumfo, ɔdɔ Nyame,   
Yɛn nkwagye Nyankopɔn no;   
ɔma me kra ayaresa,    
Na Odum akyinnye biara;   
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!

 **2**   
Nea Nyame tumi ayɛ no,   
N'ahummɔb'rɔ bɔ ho ban;   
Anɔpab're anaa 'nwumm're   
ɔntɔ' nko na ɔnna da;   
Ne tumi ahemman no mu,   
B'ribiara tene nā ɛyɛ pɛ:   
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!

 **3**   
Awurade nni aky'riky'ri;   
Yɛn awerɛhow ny'naa mu,   
ɔne yɛn mprempren Boafo pa,   
Yɛn asomdwoe ne nhyira.   
Sɛnea 'baatan yɛ ne mma no,   
ɔhwɛ kuw a Wapaw wɔn no;   
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame.

 **4**   
Afei m'anigye kwan mu no,   
Mɛto Wo ayeyi nnwom   
Na nnipa ate nnaase a   
Mede me nne rema W' yi;   
Me koma bɔ 'se 'W'rade mu,   
Me kra ne nipadua no ny'naa!   
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!

title: Nyame Kronkron, Yɛkamfo W'
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame Kronkron, yɛkamfo W',   
Ade ny'naa Wura, yɛkoto W'!   
Fam hafo ny'naa hyɛ W'ase,   
Na ɔsorofo ny'naa Kamfo W';   
W'ahennim' trɛw nni kabea,   
Wudi hen' kosi daapem.

 **2**   
Muntie s'ro dwom dennen a   
Abɔfo nnwontofo reto;   
Kerubim ne Serafim,   
Wɔreto ayeyi dwom daa;   
Wɔn nne dɛdɛ hyɛ s'ro ma:   
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron, W'ra.

 **3**   
Agya Kronkron, 'Ba Kronkron,   
Honhom Kronkron, yɛbɔ Mo din,   
Mo ny'naa ka bom yɛ baako,   
Nyame K'ro a ntetewm' nni W' mu,   
Yebu nkotodwe kamfo W',   
B'rč a yekųra hintasɛm nom'.

title: Me Kra, Kamfo Aw'rade Kɛseyɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Me kra, kamfo Aw'rade kɛseyɛ:   
Ne nhy'ra pii ma me honhom nya nkanyan;   
N'asɛm mu bɔhyɛ ma me ahoɔden;   
Me koma, bɔ 'se 'Gyenkwa Nyame mu.

 **2**   
Me kra, kamfo Ne din no kɛseyɛ:   
Ky'rɛ Ne tumi, nea Ne basa ayɛ;   
N'adɔe wɔ hɔ awo ntoatoaso ny'naam',   
Ne din kronkron, Aw'rade Tumfo no.

 **3**   
Me kra, kamfo Ne tumi kɛseyɛ:   
Atumfo de wɔn anuonyam to nkyɛn;   
Ahantan koma ne ɔpɛ ny'naa guan,   
Nea 'kɔm de mee, wɔma 'wiɛmfo so.

 **4**   
Me kra, kamfo N'asɛm no anuonyam:   
Ne bɔhyɛ tim hɔ, N'adɔe wɔ hɔ daa;   
Me kra, kamfo Aw'rade kɛseyɛ   
Ky'rɛ awo ntoatoaso kosi daapem.

title: Sɛ Yɛhyɛ Nyame 'Nounyam Yɛn
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛ yɛhyɛ nyame 'nounyam yɛn dwomtom'   
Na yɛn nkamfo si ahantan kwan a,   
ɛte sɛnea abɔde ny'naa team sɛ:   
Haleluya!

 **2**   
Mpɛn pii na yehu wɔ yɛn dwonto mu,   
Nnyigyei mu suahun' s'roko foforo,   
B're a ɔsom kanyan yɛn ma yɛto   
Haleluya!

 **3**   
So anadwo no Yesu anto dwom,   
B're a bonsam ne haa dii asi no?   
Momma yɛnto dwom mma nkonimdifon':   
Haleluya!

 **4**   
Ma wɔnfa nsanku ny'naa nto 'yeyi dwom;   
Ma wɔn a wɔwɔ dwonto nne mmɔ 'se;   
nyame, ma yɛn gyidi mfa ndwom daa,   
Haleluya!

title: Monto Dwom Fof'ro Mma No
markdown:
**1**   
Monto dwom fof'ro mma No,   
Anwanwade ny'naa fi No,   
Munni Ne nkonim mu   
'H'rusi nky'rɛ Ne tum'.   
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade.

 **2**   
Ne nkwagye ada adi    
Kosi asase ano.   
ɔda so kae N'adɔe Ne ne nokware;   
Ne mma ho dɔ no nsakra da.

 **3**   
Monto dwom fof'ro mmɔ 'se,   
Munyi N'ayɛ aman mu.   
Ma dwonto nne, abɛn, Ne torobɛnto   
Mmɔ 'se Aw'rade 'nigye mu

 **4**   
Mo ne mmepɔ ne po mmom'   
Nto ayeyi dwom dennen,   
ɔde atɛntrenee Reba 'sase so,   
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade.

title: Nyan Dwom No
markdown:
**1**   
Nyan anika ne 'nigye dwom;   
Fa wo nnwom mu dwom bra ha;   
To aw'rɛhow dadwen ny'naa gu,   
Na da w'ayeyi adi.   
To dwom kyerɛ Nea Ne banbɔ   
De yɛn ahyiam sɛ nnamfo,   
Na Ne nne dɛdɛ no ky'rɛ yɛn   
Kwan kɔ Kristo nan ase.

 **Nnyeso**   
Nyan dwom no, nyan dwom no,   
Anika ne 'nigye dwom;   
Nyan dwom no, nyan dwom no,   
Afenhyia da dwom no.

 **2**   
'Nigyem' yɛde nnwom ne frankaa   
Behyia ah'rusi da no;   
Yɛbɛteam ato hosana,   
Na yɛde nnaase asom.   
Yɛbɛka yɛn Gyefo n' 'nuonyam,   
B're a yɛdwen soro ho   
Na yɛka 'tete asɛm no',   
Asɛnkunin ɔ nkwagye dɔ!

 **3**   
Yɛda W'ase, Agya Kronkron,   
Afe no mu adɔe nti;   
B'rč a yɛahyia yi, ma koma ny'naa   
Mfa 'seda mi ah'rusi.   
Yɛda W'ase, 'Gyenkwa Dɔfo,   
Wo mogyā a agye yɛn nti,   
Honhom Kronkron, hom gu yɛn so,   
Ka yɛn brɛoo kɔ Nyame nkyɛn.

title: Momfa Dwonto Ne Anuonyam
markdown:
**1**   
Momfa dwonto ne anuonyam   
Mma s'ro Aw'rade no;   
ɔtrɛw Ne mununkum mu s'ro,   
Na nsu kata ewim.

 **2**   
ɔtɔ Ne nhy'ra bosu gu fam,   
De dwudwo asase;   
ɔma wura fu mmepɔ so,   
Ma 'burow nyin bonhwam'.

 **3**   
N'agyina mu na nsakrae ba   
Afe no 'kwantu mu.   
ɔhyɛ owia ma no hintaw,   
Ma awɔbere ba.

 **4**   
ɔma N'asɛm nan suky'rɛma;   
Ͻma mfude yɛ frɔmm;   
ɔma mframa a 'mu yɛ hyɛw   
Bɔ ma 'susow nsu sen.

 **5**   
Mframa ne mununkum nyinaa   
Yɛ setie ma N'asɛm:   
Momfa dwonto ne anuonyam   
Nkamfo 'W'rade Tumfo.

title: O Wo a Me Kra Ho Sɛpɛ No
markdown:
**1**   
O Wo a me kra ho sɛpɛ no W'anim,   
Wo a meba Wo nkyɛn 'hohiam,   
M'adekyee mu w'rɛkyekye ne 'nadwo dwom,   
M'anidaso ne me nkwagye.

 **2**   
Ne nne a ɛyɛ dɛ sɛ dɔn nnyigyei no,   
Wɔte wɔ 'wu sunsuma mu;   
Lebanon twenn'ro koto Ne nan ase,   
Ne home ma mframam' yɛ huam.

 **3**   
Trenee fi N'anofafam' sen sɛ nsuti,   
De gugu ɔdom nturo so;   
'Hɔ na amanaman behu wɔn nkwagye,   
Na N'anim s'rew ahy'rɛn wɔn so.

 **4**   
ɔhwɛ, na 'bɔfo mpempem di ah'rusi,   
Na dɔm kuhaa twɛn tie N'asɛm.   
ɔkasa, na Ne nne kanyan daa dwonto,   
Nea wɔde kamfo Aw'rade.

title: Me Kra Kamfo Wo Yɛfo No
markdown:
**1**   
Me kra kamfo wo Yɛfo no   
Nnwom a ɛf'ro kɔ s'ro mu;   
Nea Ne dɔ de s'ro akyɛde   
Ahyɛ wo nna ny'naa ma no.   
Mehwehwɛɛ No, Otiee me su;   
N'abɔfo kronkron bɔ nsraban   
Wɔn a wɔdɔ No no ho.

 **2**   
Awurade yɛ ma wɔn a   
Wɔhwehwɛ No 'w'rɛhowb'rem';   
ɔkyekye mmɔb'rɔfo werɛ.   
Ma yɛn da biara mu 'dom.   
'W'rɛhow tra hɔ 'nadwo ny'naa a   
'Dekyee bepue dɛw ne hann mu   
De nhy'ra fi N'anim aba.

 **3**   
ɔbɛdan N'ani brɛoo aky'rɛ   
'Manehunfō a wɔbɛn No;   
Ne dɔ 'yamye to rentwa mma   
Wɔn a wɔtwer' No sųro No.   
Yɛn Nyankopɔn rennyaw Ne de;   
Ne s'ro agua no tim hɔ daa;   
N'ahenni begyina daa.

title: Sɔre, Me Kra Sɔre!
markdown:
**1**   
Sɔre, me kra sɔre!   
Twe w' mu kɔ s'ro nneɛma ho,   
Na yɛ ntɛm kɔ wo Gyefo Nyame nan ase;   
'Nipá ani nhu No de,   
ɔte hann nwanwaso mu.   
Monsom No 'hobrɛasem'   
Na momfre No Wura.

 **2**   
Ne dɔ apontow retwɛn mo s'ro hɔ;   
ɔma yɛte saa apontow no nka fam ha!   
Di dɛw, me kra, di dɛw,   
Ma wo nne so kɔ s'ro:   
Haleluya, haleluya, haleluya!

 **3**   
Afei tie s'ro nsanku!   
O, tie nkonimdi dwom no,   
Dwom a wonwie to da a egyigye wɔ wim!   
Wɔmfa mmaa nnipa sɛ   
Wɔnto 'nuonyam dwom sei bi;   
Nso yɛbetum' ato y'ayeyi dwom fam ha!

 **4**   
Ne mogya tɔɔ yɛn, Nyame aponfo;   
ɔno na daa tumi ne nkonim yɛ Ne de.   
Momma Amen kɛse n'   
Nnyigye wɔ soro bio:   
Haleluya, haleluya, haleluya!

title: Aw'rade, Wobɛte Me Nne
markdown:
**1**   
Aw'rade, Wobɛte me nne   
Anɔpa nnwonto mu;   
Na mɛbɔ mpae akyerɛ Wo,   
Wo na mehwɛ W'anim.

 **2**   
ɔsoro hɔ, nea Kristo kɔ   
Kodi ma 'hotefo;   
Na ɔde yɛn nnwom ne nsɛm gu   
N'Agya 'hengua anim.

 **3**   
O, ma Wo Honhom nni m'anim   
Wɔ trenee akwan so;   
Ma 'sɛde kwan biara ntene   
Nyɛ petee wɔ m'anim.

 **4**   
Wɔn a wɔdɔ Wo, sųro Wo din   
Behu wɔn apɛde;    
Onyame Tweaduampɔn de dom   
Bɛyɛ kyɛm ama wɔn.

title: Nyame Indeɔda Pa No
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame Homeda pa no   
Aba 'sase so bio,   
Te sɛ 'huhub'rem' 'nɔpa,   
B'rč a 'nadwo yaw atwam;   
Ͻba sɛ bosu nwinnwin   
'Fɔ 'sase kesee bi;   
Te sɛ mmɛkuw nwini wɔ   
Anweatam hunu so.

 **2**   
W'ra yɛn 'fɔrebɔde ni,   
Ewom 'ho wɔ fi de,   
Nnwɔtwe mu dwumaden,   
Ne mu nokwaredi,   
Ahopakyi 'duaba pa   
Ne 'dɔ amapa a   
Wo Honhom asiesie a   
Yɛde ma W' 'hobrɛasem'.

 **3**   
Yɛde yɛn bɔne adwen,   
Ne nneyɛe adesoa,   
Bɛba 'bɛkoto W'anim,   
Ahwehwɛ 'hofadi.   
Yɛn komam' 'w'rɛhow kɛse   
Ne W'adwumā a yɛanyɛɔ    
Talɛnte pii a yɛasɛe!   
Nkonim ket'wá a yedii.

 **4**   
Saa 'werɛhow yi mu no,   
Yɛde gyidi mapa,   
Ne ɔdɔ a emu dɔ   
Ba sɛ Wobɛtew ho,   
Na ama yɛanya   
W'anim Fafiri a yehia   
Ne daapem asomdwoe ampa.

title: Nyankopɔn Anuonyam H'ran a
markdown:
**1**   
Nyankopɔn anuonyam h'ran a,    
Ͻde hann fi daa hann mu ba;   
Nkwa Hann, nsuti a ɛtč ase,    
Da pá a ɛde hann ma naa ny'naa.

 **2**   
O, nokwar' 'Wia, W'animtew   
Mmra yɛn so 'dehyedi hann mu;   
Honhom no hann a ɛtew ho,   
Hy'rɛn yɛn fam ha adwen no mu.

 **3**   
'Nigye da a ɛresen no   
Ma 'dwenemtew sɛ 'nɔpawi,   
Gyidi te sɛ 'wigyinae hann,   
B'rč a 'nadwo sum nhyɛ yɛn kra so.

 **4**   
'Nɔpa 'nuonyam hy'rɛn fam ne wim;   
Momma 'Nɔpa kronn no nsɔre;   
Agya no mma hwehwɛ Ne mmoa   
To N'anuonyam din no ho dwom.   
Amen.

title: B're a 'Dekyee Hann Hy'rɛn Wim Yi
markdown:
**1**   
B're a 'dekyee hann hy'rɛn wim yi,   
Yɛma yɛn koma so ma No,   
Sɛ yɛn nneyɛe biara mu no,   
Onyi yɛn mfi mmusu mu nnɛ.

 **2**   
ɔmmɔ yɛn tɛkrɛma ho ban;   
Onyi yɛn nkwa mfi abufuwm'   
ɔmmma yɛnnhwɛ adebɔne,   
Na ɔmmma yenntie 'huhude.

 **3**   
Sɛ saa da foforo yi twam,    
Na anadwo beduru a,   
B'rč a nkekae bi nni yɛn mu no   
Yɛayi N'ayɛ, yɛn nkonim ho.

 **4**   
Ayeyi nka Wo, ɔbɔadeɛ!   
Ayeyi nka Wo, daa Asɛm!   
Ayeyi nka Wo, Honhom pa!   
Yɛto dwom b'rč a hann wɔ hɔ yi.

title: Sɛ Anim Rebuebue
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛ anim rebuebue,   
Na me koma nyan a,   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'   
Adwumam' ne mpaebɔm'   
Mitwi bɛn me Yesu:   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

 **2**   
Sɛ asɔre dɔn bɔ   
Gyigye mmepɔ mu a.   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'   
O muntie ne dwom noɔ   
Ͻwoso ɔdɛw mu:   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu! '

 **3**   
'Nadwo dane 'dekyee,   
Yefi komam ka sɛ:   
'Avevi nka Yesu!'   
Sum mu 'tumfo suro,   
Sɛ wɔte saa dwom yi:   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

 **4**   
Mo aman'man nyinaa   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'   
Munhu mo nkabom ha:   
Ma asase nyinaa,   
Mfa 'h'rusi nto dwom no:   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

 **5**   
S'ro daa 'nigye mu no,   
Eyi ne dwom pa no   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'   
'Sase ne po ne wim   
Nnye so mfi fam nkɔ s'ro:   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

 **6**   
Nɔkwa yɛ me de yi,   
Me soro dwom ne sɛ   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'   
Ma saa daapem dwom yi,   
Nnyigye nnasanten mu;   
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

title: Adekyee Aba
markdown:
**1**   
Adekyee aba, sɛnea 'dii kan no,   
Anomaa asu, sɛ kan de no.   
Yɛto ayeyi, dwonto ne 'dekyee,   
Ne Asɛm no a efim' bae nti.

 **2**   
'Sutɔ fof'ro a efi s'ro yɛ fɛ,   
Te sɛ bosu a edii kan no.   
Yɛto ayeyi, mfuw a afɔ nō a   
Ͻde mudi pue fi neá Otiae no.

 **3**   
'Wia hann no wɔ me! 'Dekyee no wɔ me;   
Ne ny'naa fi hann a Eden hui no!   
Yɛto ayeyi anɔpa biara,   
Da foforo a Nyamč abɔ nti.

title: Bue W'apon Fɛfɛ No Seesei
markdown:
**1**   
Bue w'apon fɛfɛ no seesei,   
Siɔon, ma menhyɛn' mu hɔ,   
Nea me kra fi anigye mu   
Twɛn mpaebɔ tiefo Nyame.   
O, sɛnea wɔahyira ha,   
'Somdwoe, hann ne dom wɔ ha!

 **2**   
Domfo Nyame meba W'anim,   
Wo nso sian bra me nkyɛn ha;   
Faakō a yehu Wo, som Wo no,   
Yɛte soro nka wɔ hɔ.   
Bra bɛtra me koma mu,   
Ma ɛnyɛ Wo fie seesei.

 **3**   
Woyi W'ayɛ 'nigyem wɔ ha,   
Wogu W'aba no wɔ ha;   
Ma faakō a wɔatim me kra no   
Ͻnso abapa nkutoo.   
Na nea mete biara no,   
Aso nkwa aba me mu.

 **4**   
Nyan me gyidi yɛ no kɛse   
Ma menkōra Wo s'ro 'kyɛden';   
Sɛ sɔhwɛ ky're me so dɛn a,   
Ma W'asɛm no nhy'rɛn me so,   
Sɛ me ns'romma kwanky'rɛfo,   
Ne haw mu w'rɛkyekyefo.

 **5**   
'W'ra kasa, na mɛte Wo nne;   
Ma Wo pɛ nyɛ hɔ ampa;   
Na ma mintwiw mmɛn Wo koraa   
B're a Woyɛn Wo nk'rɔfo;   
Nkwa asuti sen wɔ ha,   
Yɛn haw 'no ad'ru wɔ ha.

title: Wo Ne Me Ntra, Onwin' Adwo
markdown:
**1**   
Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!   
Adekyee atwam kɔ;   
Anwumm're sunsuma aba;   
Anadwo reba ntɛm!   
Dɔfo pā a Wote me komam',   
Bra na bɛtra me fie.

 **Nnyeso**   
'Gyenkwa, ne me ntra 'nadwo yi,    
Hwɛ, anwumm're adu!   
'Gyenkwa, ne me ntra 'nadwo yi,    
Hwɛ, anwumm're adu!

 **2**   
Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!   
Me ne W' nantew nnɛ no,   
Ama me koma ahosan,   
Yɛn nkitahodi nom'.   
Wo nsɛm no ahyɛ me kra ma   
De me abɛn Wo nkyɛn.

 **3**   
Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!   
Mɛyɛ ankonam 'nadwo' I   
B're a me ne Wo nni nkɔmmɔ,   
Na minhu Wo hann no.   
Misųro sɛ ɛbɛma wiase sum   
Abɛhyɛ me fie ma.

title: Nyame' a Woyɛɛ S'ro Ne 'Sase
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame a Woyɛɛ s'ro ne 'sase   
Esum ne hann:   
Woyɛɛ 'dekyee maa 'dwumayɛ,   
'Nadwo, 'home;   
Ma W'abɔfo mmɔ yɛn ho ban,   
Na ma yɛn nna pa Wo dom mu;   
Ma yɛnso dae nnya 'nidaso   
'Nadwo yi ny'naa.

 **2**   
Sɛ yɛnyan' 'dekyee fof'ro mu,   
Fa 'bra kwan sō a,   
Nea 'besi biara, ma yenni   
W'apɛde so.   
Kōra yɛn so fi bɔn' tumi ho;   
Bɔ yɛn ho ban kwan hihiaa yim',   
Nyi W'animte mfi yɛn so da,   
Da mu no ny'naa.

 **3**   
Wɛn yɛn sɔre ne yɛn nna mu,   
Ne 'wu mu nso,   
Wo banbɔ kɛsem' ma yenya   
Asomdwoe nna.   
Sɛ t'robɛnto nne nyan yɛn a,   
O Awurade pa, nnyaw yɛn,   
Na ma yɛne Wo nkodi hen'   
'Nuonyam mu s'ro.

 **4**   
Agya Kronkron a Wote s'ro,   
ɔba Kronkron,   
Honhom Kronkron, yɛn akyɛde,   
Baasakoro:   
Dom yɛn seesei kosi b're a   
Yɛde yɛn kyɛw begu W'anim,   
Na yɛde nnwom pa 'kamfo Wo   
Nnasanten mu.

title: A Dekyee Hann De Bɔkɔɔ
markdown:
**1**   
Adekyee hann de bɔkɔɔ   
Retwam fi yɛn anim kɔ:   
Yɛapɔn yɛn nnwuma yi no,   
W'ra yɛne Wo bɛkasa.

 **2**   
Wō a W'ani hu ade ny'naa   
Na b'ribiara nhinta Wo,   
Fa mfomso a ada adi   
Ne kokoam bɔn' biara f'ri.

 **3**   
Ͻrenkyɛ, adekyee hann   
Betwam afi yɛn so kōraa;   
B'rč a 'w'rɛhow ny'naa atwam no,   
'W'ra ma yɛmmɛtra Wo nkyɛn.

title: 'Gyenkwa, Hy'ra Yɛn Anwumm're Yi
markdown:
**1**   
'Gyenkwa, hy'ra yɛn anwumm're yi,   
Ansa na yɛakɔdeda;   
Yɛka yɛn bɔne kyerɛ W;   
Wutum' sa yare, gye nkwa.

 **2**   
Sɛ sum d'ru kabii yi hu a,    
Esum ntum' mfa Wo nhinta;   
Wone Nea ɔmm'rɛ da no nti,   
Wowɛn Wo mma baabiara.

 **3**   
Sɛ ɔsɛe mpo twa yɛn ho hyia,   
Na agyan tu framfram a,   
W'abɔfo 'wɛmfo no wɛn yɛn,   
Sɛ Wobɛn a, yenya nkwa.

 **4**   
Sɛ owu bɛfa yɛn mpof'rim'   
Na yɛn mpa yɛ asiei a,   
Ma yenyan 'nuonyam 'nɔpa no   
Wɔ tebeā a owu nnim mu.

title: Wo Ne Me Ntra
markdown:
**1**   
Wo ne me ntra, onwini redwo ntɛm,   
Esum red'ru, 'Wura, Wo ne me ntra;   
Sɛ boafo sa, na 'w'rɛkyekye tu kɔ a,   
Mmɔb'rɔfo boafo, O, Wo ne me ntra.

 **2**   
Nɔkwa da ketewa yi retwam ntɛm,   
Ha dɛw resa, n'anuonyam retwam kɔ,   
Nsakrae ne p'rɔe na mihu baabiara;   
O, Wo a Wonsakra, Wo ne me ntra.

 **3**   
Mihia Wo wɔ dɔnhwere biara mu,   
Wo dom na etum' di bonsam so nim,   
Hena n' ɔbɛyɛ me wɛmfo sɛ Wo,   
Munumkum ne awiam', Wo ne me ntra.

 **4**   
Sɛ Woka me ho a minsuro dɔm, nwene,   
Haw mu nyɛ d'ru, na nusu nyɛ   
'Wu nwowɔe, asaman nkonim wɔ he?   
Mɛkɔ so adi nim, Wo ne me ntra.

title: Ade Resa Wɔ Atɔe
markdown:
**1**   
Ade resa wɔ atɔe,   
ɔhome fi s'ro reba;   
Twɛn na som, b're a 'nadwo   
Akanea repuepue wim   
Mmaa nyinaa yi.

 **Nnyeso**   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron   
Otweaduampɔn!   
Woahyɛ s'ro ne 'sase ma   
S'ro ne fam reyi W'ayɛ,   
ɔs'ros'roni!

 **2**   
Nkwa Wura, soro ase   
Nyinaa yɛ W'ankasa fi.   
Boa yɛn a yɛhwehwɛ Wo   
Ano kɔ Wo nguankuw mu,   
'Fisɛ Wobɛn.

 **3**   
B're a esum red'ru yi,   
Fa yɛn hyɛ Wo dɔ kokom;   
Yɛn koma nam W'anuonyam   
Nkatanim nsoromma so,   
Foro ɔs'ro.

 **4**   
B're a 'dekyee ne 'nadwo   
Twam fi yɛn ani so no,   
Abɔfo Wura, ma yɛn   
Ani nhu daa anɔpa   
Na 'sum to ntwa.

title: A Fei Ade Resa
markdown:
**1**   
Afei ade resa,    
Anadwo abɛn,   
Anwumm're sunsuma    
Nam wim brɛoo reba.

 **2**   
Agya ma ab'rɛfo    
Nnya ɔhome pa,   
Yɛn ani nka ngu so    
Wo nhyira pa mu.

 **3**   
'Dasu pɛn nyinaa mu,    
Ma W'abɔfo ntrɛw   
Wɔn ntaban fitaa mu,    
Nwɛn me me mpa so.

title: Nyame, Miyi W'ayɛ 'nadwo 'i
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame, miyi W'ayɛ 'nadwo 'i,    
Adekyee mu nhy'ra nyinaa nti;   
Fa me sie, ahen' mu Hene,   
Wɔ Wo ntaban kɛsɛ n' ase!

 **2**   
'Wura, fa me bɔne kyɛ me   
Nnɛ da yim', Wo dɔ Ba no nti;   
Na me ne wiase ne Wo ntam   
Ayɛ dwoo ansa na mada.

 **3**   
O, ma me kra nhome Wo mu,   
Na m'ani nkata nna pa mu;   
Nna a ɛbɛma me 'hoɔden,   
Na masɔre asom Nyame.

 **4**   
'Domfo Nyame, munyi N'ayɛ   
Asase mma, munyi N'ayɛ   
ɔs'ro dɔm, munyi No ayɛ;   
Agya, 'Ba, ne Honhom Kronkron.

title: Hann Pa, Nyame Dom a
markdown:
**1**   
Hann pa, Nyame dom a    
Wohwɛ Agya n' anim;   
Daa 'nuonyam kata Wo ho;    
Kronkronni a wɔahy'ra W',   
Yɛn Agyenkwa Kristo,    
W'ahoyi yɛ anigye.

 **2**   
Adekyee retwam komm,    
Yehu anwumm're hann,   
B're a yɛreto yɛn dwom;    
Agyā a Ne tumi so,   
Ne Bā a Woyɛɛ 'nipa,    
Ne Honhom Kronkron dɛɛfon'.

 **3**   
Wofata sɛ Wogye    
Nnwom kronkron nkamfo ny'naa,   
O, Nyame Ba, nkwa Mafo;    
ɔs'ros'roni, Wo na   
Wiase hyɛ W 'anuonyam,    
Wɔbɛma Wo so daa daa.

title: Yesu 'Guanhwɛfo Pa, Tie Me
Nyame, Dā a Wode Mae No Asa
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame, dā a Wode mae no asa,   
Sum nam Wo tumi so reba;   
Yɛtoo yɛn anɔpa dwom maa Wo,   
W'ayeyi tew yɛn home ho.

 **2**   
Yɛda W'ase sɛ W'asafo nnae   
B're a 'sase rebɛn hann yi;   
ɔhwɛ ne ho yie wiase nyinaam',   
ɔnhome awia ne 'nadwo.

 **3**   
Asase ne supɔw biara so,   
Adekyee ma da fof'ro ba;   
Mpaebɔ nne renyɛ komm da biara;   
Na 'yeyi nso to rentwa Da.

 **4**   
'Wura, ma ɛnyɛ sa, W'ahenni   
Rengu sɛ asase so de,   
Na ebegyina na anyin' daa,   
Kosi sɛ Wo de ny'naa bebom.

title: Afei 'Bɔde Ny'naa Reda
markdown:
**1**   
Afei 'bɔde ny'naa reda,   
Anadwo sum abedu   
Nkųro, nnipa ne mmoa so;   
Nanso, wo, me koma nyan,   
Fa bere kakra bɔ mpae,   
Kamfow' Bɔfon' ansa woada.

 **2**   
Me Yesu, bɛtra me nkyɛn,   
Na mma 'tamfo bi mmɛn me.   
Wo ntaban katam' so;   
Sɛ tamfo yi me hu a,   
Mma no mmfa me nnkɔ 'manem',   
Mmom W'abɔfon' nto dwom me nkyɛn.

 **3**   
M'adɔfo, monhome dwoo,   
Yɛn Nyame bɛkōra mo so   
Afi mmusu biaram',   
ɔbɛma moanya nna pa,   
Na Ne dom atra mo nkyɛn,   
Na wɔawɛn mo wɔ mo mpa so.

title: Tie, Anwumm're Dwom Regyigye
markdown:
**1**   
Tie, anwumm're dwom regyigye   
Wɔ asu no so bɔkɔɔ;   
Ne nnyigyei no rebɛn ara.

 **2**   
Yɛte no bɔkɔɔ wɔ asom.   
Di ah'rusi, di ah'rusi,   
Di ah'rusi, Amen.

title: Yɛwɔ Dɛw Kɛse, B'rč a Yehyiam'
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛwɔ dɛw kɛse, b'rč a yehyiam'    
Nea W'ra no ka yɛn bom no;   
Nea yɛsom Agya Nyankopɔn    
Wɔ Ne Ba no Honhom mu.   
Wohu N'asafo no,    
Faako a wɔyɛ Ne pɛ.

 **2**   
Hama a 'som bo n'ɛde yɛn    
Fam Nyame ho yɛn mm'rɛwyɛm';   
Nea 'kae yɛn sɛ ɔda so yɛ    
Yɛn Botantim no, som bo.   
Nokwar' dɔ da n'adi    
Sɛ 'Hwɛfo no nguan wɔ ha.

 **3**   
Ma yensua mfi Kristo nhwɛsom'    
Nea yɛyɛ mpaebɔ fie yi:   
Nea ɔtew asɔr'fie ho no    
Pɛ sɛ yɛn ny'naa som wɔ hɔ.   
ɔba no mpam 'biara:    
'Biara wɔ kwan N'ahennim'.

 **4**   
'Wura, kanyan yɛn ma yenhu    
Wiasč a ehia nkwagye no!   
Asafo no 'dwuma som bo,    
Yɛde mmɔdemmɔ gu so!   
Yɛmfa nokwarediɔ     
Sei na yɛyɛ Nyame pɛ.

title: Hy'rafo Yesu, W'asɛm So
markdown:
**1**   
Hy'rafo Yesu, W'asɛm so   
Na yɛahyia mu rebetie Wo;   
Kanyan yɛn koma ne kra   
N'ɛnhwehwɛ Wo, nnɔ Wo, nsųro Wo;   
Na Wo nky'rɛky'rɛ kronkron no nti,   
Ͻnnan mfi wiase, nnɔ Wo nko.

 **2**   
Yɛn nimdeɛ, yɛn adehu;   
Ne ny'naa hyɛ esum kabii mu,   
Kosi sɛ Wo Honhom no   
De nokware hann bɛhy'rɛn mu.   
Yɛn nkwagye no fi W nkutoo.   
Di dwuma pa nyinaa yɛn mu.

 **3**   
'W'ra 'nuonyamfo, bra yɛn mu!   
Hann mu hann a Wufi Nyamem',   
Bue yɛn asom' ne komam'.   
Fa Wo Honhom no so boa yɛn;   
Tie Wo nkurɔfo sufrɛ yi   
Tie, na hy'ra yɛn mpae ne 'yeyi.

title: Nyame Wɔ Ha!
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame wɔ ha! B're a Ne mma    
Hyiam nkamfo ne mpaebɔm' yi,   
Anka ma yenhu no kɛse    
Nea yɛn ny'naa kyɛ wɔ Kristom.   
Ͻha, ne wiase baabiara,    
Yɛn nimdeɛ ahorow ny'naa   
Twɛn sɛ Honhom no bɛhyɛne    
Adwen ne komā a abuem'.

 **2**   
Nsohyɛde bɛkae yɛn wɔ ha,    
Adom a yehia daa ny'naa;   
Ͻha na 'sɛnkapon wɔ;    
Asɛm no di kan wɔ ha.   
Ͻha na nokwar' 'sɛnka mu.    
Kommyɛ ne ɔkasa mu,   
Fof'royɛ ne nsakrae mu no,    
Honhom no bā obiara nkyɛn.

 **3**   
Yɛn mmofra nya 'nika wɔ ha,    
'Hwɛfo no nguankuw no mu;   
B'rč a yedi paanoo nom nsa no,    
Kristo kɔ so hwɛ yɛn so.   
Ͻha, 'Somfo no asomfo    
Fi ɔsom mu hwehwɛ nea   
Ͻky'rɛ wɔ daa 'setram',    
Sɛnea wɔgye di ampa.

 **4**   
Asafo ne ahemman W'ra,    
Nsakrae ne 'kyinnye b're yi,   
Yɛ yɛn 'sɛmpan' ho nokwafo,    
Ma yɛnnaW' botae adi.   
Ͻha, 'nnɛ 'hofama som yim',    
Nea yɛma, nea yenya ny'naa,   
Yɛn a yɛtč ase Wo mu yi,    
Yɛkamfo Wo, yɛgye di!

title: Sɛnea Wo Trabea Yɛ Fɛ Fa
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛnea Wo trabea yɛ fɛ fa,    
Asafo Aw'rade!   
Na Wo dom ntamadan no mu,    
Sɛnea 'hɔ yɛ dɛ fa!

 **2**   
Me kra brɛfo ani gyina,    
Sɛ 'behu W'abangua;   
Me koma ne me honam team    
Ky'rɛ W', Nyame Teasefo.

 **3**   
Hwɛ sɛnea apatuprɛ nya    
Ofie gye n'ahome;   
Na asomfrakatakyi nso    
Nya p'rebu ma ne ho.

 **4**   
W'afɔrebukyia no mu mpo,    
ɔbɛto ne nma hɔ;   
Wo, asafo 'Wrade Tumfo,    
Me Hen' me Nyame.

 **5**   
Nhy'ra ne wɔn a wɔte Wo fie,    
Woyi Wo ayɛ daa.   
Nhy'ra ne nea n'ahoɔden ne Wo,    
W'akwan wɔ ne komam.

title: Bra Ma Yɛnto Dwom Mma'
markdown:
**1**   
Bra ma yɛnto dwom mma'    
W'rade; Momma yɛn mu biara,   
Mɔfa anigye mmɔ ose    
Mma yɛn nkwagye Botan.

 **2**   
Momma yɛnnante mmra    
N'anim Wɔ aseda nne mu;   
Bra ma yɛnto 'yeyi mma No,    
Mmɔ No 'se 'nigye mu

 **3**   
Nyankopɔn yɛ ɔhenkɛse    
Anyame nyinaa so;   
Asase mu bun wɔ Ne nsam,    
Mmepɔ 'hoɔden wɔ No.

 **4**   
ɔno na ɛpo yɛ Ne de,    
Na ɔno na ɔyɛe;   
Na asase pɛsɛɛ no nso,    
Ne nsa na ɛnwenee.

 **5**   
Mommra mma yɛnkoto nsom No,   
Na yemmutu mmɔ mpae;   
Mommra yɛn Yɛfo no anim    
Mmetie No nnɛ da yi.

title: Nyame, Fa Wo Nhyira Pɔn Yɛn
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame, fa Wo nhyira pɔn yɛn,    
Fa dɛw hyɛ yɛn komam' fɔmm;   
Ma yɛn mu biara nya Wo dɔ,    
Nni nkonim nkwagye dom mu:   
O dwudwo yɛn, O dwudwo yɛn,    
Yɛretu kwan sar' so yi.

 **2**   
Yɛda W'ase, yɛkamfo Wo,    
W'asɛmpa dɛdɛ no nti;   
Ma Wo nkwagye ho aba no    
Mm'ro so yɛn komam ne 'bram';   
Nokware mu, nokware mu    
Ma yɛnnante W'asɛm mu.

title: Nyame Ne Wo Ntra
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio;   
N'afotu nky'rɛw' kwan mma wo so,   
ɔmmaw' banbɔ Ne nguankuw mu:   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

 **Nnyeso**   
Yebehyiam, yebehyiam ( biɔo)   
Yebehyiam Yesu nan ase   
Yebehyiam, yebehyiam ( biɔo)   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

 **2**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
ɔmfaw' nsie Ne ntaban ase,   
ɔmma wo mana da biara,   
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

 **3**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
ɔbram' haw twa wo ho hyia a,   
ɔmfa Ne basa nwowaw wo:   
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

 **4**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
Onhim ɔdɔ frankaa wo so   
Nyi owu 's'rɔkye mfi w'anim;   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

title: Nyame Ne Wo Ntra
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio;   
N'afotu nky'rɛw' kwan mma wo so,   
ɔmmaw' banbɔ Ne nguankuw mu:   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

 **2**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
ɔmfaw' nsie Ne ntaban ase,   
ɔmma wo mana da biara,   
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

 **3**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
ɔbram' haw twa wo ho hyia a,   
ɔmfa Ne basa nwowaw wo:   
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

 **4**   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,   
Onhim ɔdɔ frankaa wo so   
Nyi owu 's'rɔkye mfi w'anim;   
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

title: A W'rade, Gya W'akoa Kwan
markdown:
**1**   
Aw'rade, gya W'akoa kwan    
Asomdwoe mu seesei,   
Efisɛ m'ani ahu    
Wo gye dom 'nuonyam no:   
Hann á ɛky'rɛ wiase kwan kɔ    
Wo bepɔ kronkron so,   
Wo nkurɔfo anuonyam,    
Israel a Woapaw wɔn.

 **2**   
Afei ma kwan ma minni    
W'anuonyam hann n'akyi,   
Kosi sɛ sum ny'naa bɛy'ra,    
Na gyidi bedi mu;   
Na ahotefo behyiam    
Wɔ hann mɔpoano hɔ   
Nea Kristo, Ns'romma Hy'rafon'    
Bɛhyerɛn wɔn so daa.

title: Yɛde Dɛw Rekɔ Yi
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛde dɛw rekɔ yi,   
Momma y'ani nnye.   
Yɛn Kannifō adi nim,    
Tamfo no agu;   
Kristo ne yɛn banbɔ    
Ne yɛn anigye'   
Hena na ɔbɛsɛe    
Yɛn anidaso?

 **Nnyeso**   
Yɛde dɛw rekɔ yi,   
Yɛkɔ anim yi,   
Tie yɛn ayeyi nnwom,   
ɔdɔ Nyankopɔn.

 **2**   
Yɛto ah'rusi nnwom   
Ma Agya Nyame   
Yɛde 'seda koma   
Brɛ 'Gyenkwa Nyame,   
Yɛkoto sɔre No,   
Honhom Nyankopɔn,   
Yɛde dɛw rekɔ yi,   
Nnɛ ne nna nyinaa.

title: 'W'ra, Yɛ Yɛn Kronkronfo
Yi Agya N' Ayɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Yi Agya n' ayɛ, Ne dɔ ayamye nti,    
ɔde tema hwɛ Ne mma bɔn'yɛfo so,   
Abɔfo, munyi No ayɛ wɔ soro;    
Yi Yehowá ayɛ.

 **2**   
Yi 'Gyenkwa ayɛ, N'ahummɔborɔ so,   
ɔde dom hwɛ Ne mma a Wapaw wɔn so.   
Mm'rante, mmabaawa, mo mpanin ne mmofra,    
Yi 'Gyenkwa ayɛ.

 **3**   
Yi Honhom n'ayɛ, Israel Kyigy'nafo no   
Nea wɔde No mae sɛ ɔmmɛhy'ra yɛn no,   
Yi Agya, ɔba, Honhom Kronkron n'ayɛ.   
Yi Baasa n'ayɛ.

title: Bra, ɔhene Tumfo
markdown:
**1**   
Bra, ɔhene Tumfo,    
Boa ma yɛnto W' ho dwom   
Mfa nyi W'ayɛ!   
Agya 'nuonyamfo pa,   
Nkonimdifo kɛse,   
Bedi yɛn so hene,    
Wō a Wo nnā akyɛ.

 **2**   
Bra, Asɛm a wɔwoo W'    
Ma Wo nkrantɛ no so,   
Tie yɛn mpaebɔ;   
Bra behy'ra Wo nk'rɔfo;   
Ma W'asɛm nni nkonim;   
Hwie kronkronyɛ Honhom    
No gu yɛn so!

 **3**   
Bra, 'Kyidifo kronkron,    
Di W'adanse kronkron,   
Saa 'nigye b're' I:   
Wo a Woyɛ Tumfo,   
Di koma biara so,   
Na ntwe W' ho mfi yɛ ho,    
Tumi Honhom.

 **4**   
Wō a Woyɛ Baasak'ro,    
Daa ayeyi nka Wo   
Nnasanten ny'naa:   
Ma yenhu W' tumidi   
Wɔ anuonyam mu na   
Enkosi daapem mu,    
Yɛnnɔ W' nsom Wo!

title: A Nadwo Nsoromma Bɔfo
markdown:
**1**   
Anadwo nsoromma Bɔfo,   
Wo a Woyɛ adasa Hann,   
Kristo, yɛn nyinaa Agyenkwa,   
Yɛsrɛ W', yɛfrɛ Wo a, tie yɛn.

 **2**   
Yesu, Wo din kɛse no na   
Nɔkotodwe nyinaa koto;   
Soro nneɛma nyinaa wɔ Wo,   
Fam nneɛma nso yɛ Wo de, 'W'ra.

 **3**   
Agya Nyame, ɔba Nyame,   
Honhom Nyame, Baasak'ro no,   
'Nidi, ne tumi ne 'nuonyam   
Nka Mo mmeresaten nyinaa.    
Amen.

title: Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron
markdown:
**1**   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
Onyame Tumfo,   
Anɔpahema mu   
Wobɛte yɛn nne daa;   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
ɔdomfo ne Tumfo,   
Nyame Baasak'ro a wɔahyira Wo.

 **2**   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
Abɔfo som Wo,   
Wɔde wɔn ahenkyɛw   
gu ahwehwɛ po ho;   
Mɔpempem ne pedu   
som Wo wɔ ase ha;   
Wo a Wowɔɔ hɔ na Wowɔ hɔ daa.

 **3**   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
Sɛ sum de Wo sie,   
Na bɔn'yɛfo ani nhu   
W'anuonyam no a,   
Wo nkutoo ne Kronkron,   
Na obi nka Wo ho,   
Woyɛ pɛ wɔ dɔ,   
tum' ne 'hotew mu.

 **4**   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
Onyame Tumfo,   
Wo nnwuma beyi   
Wo din ayɛ fam ne s'ro   
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,   
ɔdomfo ne Tumfo   
Nyame Baasak'ro a wɔahyira Wo.

title: Nyame 'Somdwoe Te Sɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame 'somdwoe te sɛ    
'Nuonyam asuten;   
Edė ade ny'naa so    
Wɔ ne yiri mu.   
Ͻtene wɔ pɛyɛm',    
Ͻyɛ ma daa ny'naa;   
Enyin wɔ pɛyɛ mu,    
Emu kɔ so dɔ.

 **Nnyeso**   
Yehowá ahotosom',   
Koma nya nhyira   
Sɛnea Ne bɔhyɛ te,   
Ͻnya 'somdwoe pa.

 **2**   
Sɛ Ne nhyira nsa no    
Kata yɛn so a,   
'Tamfo ntum' nni akyi;    
'Sɛefo nni nny'naso:   
ɔhaw biara nni hɔ;   
Dadwen bi nni hɔ,   
Ap'rep're bi nni hɔ a.    
Ͻka honhom no.

 **3**   
'Nigye anaa sɔhwɛ    
Ny'naa fi Nyame hɔ;   
ɔde ma Ne mma ny'naa    
Sɛ ɔdɔ 'kyɛde;   
Yɛbɛtwere No yie    
Yɛn asɛde ni;   
Wɔn a wɔtwer' No yie    
Hu Ne nokwar'di.

title: Nea 'Yɛ Nwanwa Kyen So
markdown:
**1**   
Anwumm're 'witɔe yɛ anwanwade   
Te sɛ owipuei a mihu.   
Nanso 'nwanwade a ɛkanyan me kra   
Ne 'dɔ a Nyame dɔ me no.

 **Nnyeso**   
O, nea 'yɛ nwanwa kyɛn so!   
Nea 'yɛ nwanwa so   
Ne sɛ mehu sɛ ɔdɔ me.   
O, nea 'yɛ nwanwa kyɛn so!   
Nea ;yɛ nwanwa kyɛn so   
Ne sɛ mehu sɛ ɔdɔ me.

 **2**   
'Sutɔb're ne twab're yɛ 'nwanwade,   
Ewim, nsoromma, ne owia;   
Nanso 'nwanwade a ɛkanyan me kra,   
Ne nea ahyɛ ase seesei no.

title: 'Dɔ a Ͻrennyaw Mma Menkɔ
markdown:
**1**   
'Dɔ a ɛrennyaw mma menkɔ,    
Mede kra brɛfo' I hyɛ Wo mu;   
Mede me nkwa san hyɛ Wo nsa,   
Na asen afi Wo bun nom'    
Sɛ nkwa a edi mu.

 **2**   
Hann a ɛnam me kwan so daa,    
Medem' kaneā a ɛredum ma W';   
Me koma san nya ne hann no,   
Na ahy'rɛn Wo 'wia hann no mu,    
Ahoɔfɛ kɛse mu.

 **3**   
'Dɛw a ɛde yaw hwehwɛ me,    
Mibue me koma mu ma Wo;   
Mihu nyankontɔ nsutɔ mu,   
Hu sɛ bɔhyɛ no renyɛ kwa; '   
Nɔpa a nusu nnim'.

 **4**   
'Sɛnnua a ɛma me ti so   
Merentumi nguan mfi W'anim   
Misie nkwa yi mu 'nuonyam ny'naa,   
Na daakye anyane bio sɛ    
Nkwa a enni awiei.

title: O Nyame Dɔ Kɛsen'
markdown:
**1**   
O Nyame dɔ kɛsen',    
'Dɔ a ɔde ma kwa;   
Bɛhyɛ me koma ne kra ma,    
Kyerɛ me Wo nkyɛn kwan.

 **2**   
Sɛnea 'wia hyew te no,    
Wo dɔ hy'rɛn me so;   
Ͻde banbɔ kyeky're me ho,    
Twe me ba Wo nkyɛn hɔ.

 **3**   
'Po 'bufuw ano dwo,    
'S'rɔkye nyi hu biara;   
Esum kabii no mu wɔ hann,    
Efise Wo dɔ bɛn.

 **4**   
O, Nyame dɔ kɛsen'    
'Dɔ a ɔde ma kwa;   
Ͻhyɛ me koma ne kra ma,    
Ͻma me ahoɔden.

title: Nyame Dɔ Yɛn Sɛ ɔsomaa
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame dɔ yɛn sɛ ɔsomaa 'Gyenkwa n';   
Nyame dɔ yɛn, na ɔdɔ me nso.   
Dɔ a enni awiei! Mɛto N'ayeyi,   
Nyame dɔ Ne mma, ɔdɔ me nso.

 **2**   
ɔsomaa 'Gyenkwa, Gyefo hy'rafo no;   
ɔsomaa No sɛ ɔmmɛgye me.   
Dɔ a enni awiei! Mɛto N'ayeyi,   
Nyame dɔ Ne mma, ɔdɔ me nso.

 **3**   
ɔmaa m' akwaaba, Mmɔb'rɔhun' 'sɛm ni;   
ɔmaa m' akwaaba, ɔs'ro nne ni.   
Dɔ a enni awiei! Mɛto N'ayeyi,   
Nyame dɔ Ne mma, ɔdɔ me nso.

 **4**   
'Nuonyam ne 'nidi nka daapem dɔ no   
Mmeresanten ne mfesanten ny'naa.   
Dɔ a enni awiei! Mɛto N'ayeyi,   
Nyame dɔ Ne mma, ɔdɔ me nso.

title: Nyame Dɔ Yɛ Den Yɛ Nokwar'!
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame dɔ yɛ den yɛ nokwar'!   
Enni awiei, 'yɛ fof 'ro daa;   
Ase yɛ tena, wɔntɔ nso;   
Ͻtra nimdeɛ ne adwen ny'naa.

 **2**   
Nyame dɔ yɛ kɛse, 'mu dɔ,   
Emu dɔ tra nipa tan ny'naa;   
Edi mu, wɔ n'ankasa hann;   
Ͻnsakra da, etim hɔ daa.

 **3**   
Nea ɔbɛsoaa yɛn 'nimguase   
Dua so nom' na yɛkan Wo yie;   
ɔno na Agya n' somaa No,   
Sɛ ɔmmɔ yɛn bra, nwu yɛn wu.

 **4**   
Yɛkan Wo tumi a ɛhy'ra   
Gye nkwa n' wɔ damoa sum mu mpo;   
Na owusɔre hann no mu   
Yɛkan W'ahoɔden mayɛ no.

 **5**   
Nyame dɔ, yɛn kyɛm ne boafo   
Wɔ yɛn kwan so mmusu nyinaam;   
Daa dɔ, Wo mu na yɛhome,   
Nya daa korabea ne nhyira.

title: Nyame Wiase, Sɛnea Ͻtrɛw
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame wiase, sɛnea ɛtrɛw,    
Ͻyɛ nwanwa, na ɛyɛ fɛ,   
Ͻtra onipa nhunumu,    
Nso ɛntra Agya no nhwɛso!   
Yɛnyɛ 'hɔho 'sase yi so    
A yetwa yɛn ho 'wi yė ase;   
Yɛyɛ Nyame mma, 'ha yɛ fie    
Ma yɛn ne mmusuakuw nyinaa.

 **2**   
'Nipa wiase, nea wɔbɔ bra,    
Nea 'nigye ne yaw di afra,   
Bɔne ne papa ayɛ ma,    
Nso ɛsɛ sɛ papa di hen'!   
'Yi ne wiase a Nyame dɔ,    
Ne Yɛfo t'rimbɔ yɛ papa;   
Nyame nkonimdi bɔhyɛ no,    
Da adi Ne nipayɛ mu.

 **3**   
Bere wiase a mfe pii wom!    
Da k'ro bi, bere gyinaa dinn,   
Saa bere kunin a wɔtim    
Asɛnnua bi bepɔ so no;   
Wohuu 'dɔ tumi yaw ne 'wum';    
Bere 'hintasɛm daa adi,   
Nyame akwan mu nyansa no    
'Dom a ɛsa 'nipa yare.

title: Sɛ Mede 'Bɔfo Tɛkrɛma Kasa
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛ mede 'bɔfo tɛkrɛma kasa,    
Mewɔ adiyi 'kyɛde,   
Mikųra nimdeɛ a ahinta safoa,    
Me gyidi tutu mmepɔ,   
Na minni dɔ a, mensɛ hwee;    
Minni dɔ a ɛyɛ kwa;   
'Wura, Wode Wo nkwa som afof 'ro:    
Kyerɛ me eyi ase.

 **2**   
'Dɔ wɔ boasetɔ, ennim ahoɔyaw,    
Ͻmpene bɔneyɛ so,   
N'ani nnye atɛn a ɛntene ho,    
Ͻpɛ sɛ nokwar' di nim.   
'Dɔ abodwoky'rɛ nni awiei,    
Etum' hyia sɔhwɛ biara.   
'Wura, Wode Wo nkwa som afof 'ro:    
Wo dom nnim a Mɛhwč ase.

 **3**   
Nimdeɛ a ahinta, 'nisoadehun',    
Ne adiyi to betwa:   
Gyidi, 'nidaso ne 'dɔ tim hɔ daa,    
Na ɔdɔ ne 'mu kɛse.   
Sɛ minni dɔ a mensɛ hwee,    
Minni dɔ a ɛyɛ kwa;   
'Wura, Wode Wo nkwa som afof 'ro:    
Kyerɛ me eyi ase.

title: Yehowa 'Hengua No Anim
Omonsom Hen' No, S'ro
markdown:
**1**   
O monsom Hen' no, s'ro 'nuonyamfo no,   
Na monto N'anwanwa dɔ no ho dwom;   
Yɛn kyɛm, yɛn Gyefo, Nea Ne nna akyɛ no,   
'Nuonyam di N' barehyia, 'yeyi bɔ N'asen.

 **2**   
Ka Ne tum' ho nsɛm, to Ne dom ho dwom,   
N'atade ne hann, 'wim kata No so;   
Aprannaa, suwisiw ne Ne teaseɛnam,   
Esum ne Ne kwan wɔ mframa ntaban so.

 **3**   
W'ayamye kɛse n', hena tumi ka?   
Ahyɛ wim ma na ɛhy'rɛn wɔ hann mu;   
Epue nkoko so, pem gu 'saseta so,   
Na ɛdan bosu ne nsu a ɛyɛ dɛ.

 **4**   
Mɔfutuma mma, yenni ahoɔden,   
Yɛtwere Wo nko, b'ribi mmu W'abam',   
Wo mmɔb'rɔhunu ase tim kosi daa,   
Wone yɛn Bɔfo, Gyefo, ne yɛn Yɔnko.

title: Nyankopɔn Tweaduampɔn
Daa Agyā a Wutumi Gye Nkwa
markdown:
**1**   
Daa Agyá a Wutumi gye nkwa,    
Wo basa sɔ as'rɔkye mu,   
Na Wohyɛ ɛpo kɛse no    
Sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɛtra n;ahye;   
Tie yɛn b're a yesu frɛ Wo    
Ma po so 'hohia mufo no.

 **2**   
Kristo, Wo a nsu tie Wo nne,    
Na wɔyɛɛ komm W'asɛm anim;   
Wo a Wonantee ɛpo so,    
Na Wodaa b're a ɛreh'ru;   
Tie yɛn b're a yesu frɛ Wo    
Ma po so 'hohia mufo no.

 **3**   
Honhom Kronkron a Wubutuu    
Nsu a sum ahyɛ so n' ani;   
Na Womaa n'abufuw to twae,    
De asomdwoe hyɛɛ ananmu:   
Tie yɛn b're a yesu frɛ Wo    
Ma po so 'hohia mufo no.

 **4**   
ɔdɔ ne tumi Basak'ro,    
Wo a Woyɛ 'kwantufo kyɛm;   
Wobɔ wɔn ho ban fi mmepɔ,    
'S'rɔkye, ogya, ne 'tamfo nsam;   
Yɛbɛto ayeyi dwom fi    
'Sase ne po so ama Wo.

title: Woyɛ Kɛse
markdown:
**1**   
Me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mifi ahodw'ri mu   
Dwennwen nsase aWo nsa ayɛ ho,   
Mihu ns'romma, mete aprannaa mmobom,   
Wo tum a ɛda adi wiase a,

 **Nnyeso**   
Me kra to dwom maW',   
m'Agyenkwa Nyame,   
Woyɛ kɛse, Woyɛ kɛse!   
Me kra to dwom maW',   
m'Agyenkwa Nyame,   
Woyɛ kɛse, Woyɛ kɛse!

 **2**   
Sɛ mikyinkyin kɔfa mfofoo ne kwae mu,   
Na mete nnmaa nnwom dɛdɛ nnua mu;   
Mifi mmepɔ atenten so hwɛ fam na   
Mete 'suten nne ne mframa dwoo a:

 **3**   
Medwen sɛ Nyame ankora Ne Ba no,   
Maa No bewui a Mintum' nte ase;   
Sɛ 'sɛnnua so ɔde 'nigye soaa m' bɔne   
Hwiee mogya gui de yii me bɔne hɔ.

 **4**   
Sɛ Kristo de osebɔ dennen sian ba   
Bɛfam' kɔ fič a, 'nigye bɛhyɛ me ma.   
Afei mede 'hobrɛase bɛtontom No,   
Na mateam sɛ: Nyame, Woyɛ kɛse!

title: Nyamč a ɔkasaa Mfiase No
markdown:
**1**   
Nyamč a ɔkasaa mfiase no    
De yɛɛ nkoko ne 'botan,   
Maa nkwa fii ase yɛɛ 'dwuma,    
Wiase ha ne s'ro ns'romma;   
Nea ɔhyɛ ma wiase tie No,    
ɔno ne yɛn nnyinaso.

 **2**   
Nyamč a ɔkasa faa nnipa    
Ne aman 'bakɔsɛm ho,   
Na ɔky'rɛ N'at'rimpɔ nnɛ no,    
Nam Ne Ba no so kasa:   
Nea ɔhyɛ ma wiase tie No,    
ɔkasa ma ɛyɛ hɔ.

 **3**   
Nyamč a N'asɛm dane 'nipa ɔ     
Kristo yɛ somfo ne 'W'ra ɔ    
ɔfrɛ yɛn kɔ som asetram;    
Kanyan koma ne ɔpɛ;   
Nea ɔhwehwɛ nnipa setie n',    
ɔno na N'asɛm di mu.

title: Mɛto Nyame Tumi Ho Dwom
markdown:
**1**   
Mɛto Nyame tumi ho dwom,    
Nea Ama mmepɔ pue,   
Nea ɔde po kɛse trɛw hɔ    
Na ɔyɛɛ soro no;   
Mɛto nyansá a ɛma owia    
Di 'dekyee so n' ho dwom;   
W'ahyɛde ma ɔsram hyerɛn,    
Na ns'romma nyinaa tie.

 **2**   
Mɛto 'W'rade yieyɛ ho dwom,    
Nea ɔmaa 'sasč aduan;   
ɔde N'asɛm ná ɛbɔɔ ade,    
Na ɔkaa sɛ ɛyɛ.   
W'ra, sɛnea W'anwanwade te    
Nea m'ani ky'rɛ biara!   
Sɛ mehwɛ 'sasč a menam so    
Anaasɛ ntremu no.

 **3**   
Fam ha dua anaa nhw'ren biara    
Yi W'anuonyam kyerɛ;   
Mununkum ne as'rɔkye nam    
W'ahyɛde so sɔre.   
Abɔde a wɔn nkwa fi Wo    
Nya banbɔ fi Wo nsam;   
Nea yebeguan akɔ biara,    
Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.

title: Ma Wɔn a Wɔte Wiase Ny'naa
markdown:
**1**   
Ma wɔn a wɔte wiase ny'naa    
Nto Yehowa Tumfo 'yeyi,   
Nhyira Ne din kronkron;    
Ma nkurɔfo nhu N'anuonyam,   
Kyerɛ aman N'anwanwade,    
Ka Ne nkwagye dom no.

 **2**   
ɔyɛɛ asase ne ewim,    
ɔyɛɛ wim 'bɔde a ɛhy'rɛn   
Odi hen' 'nuonyam mu:    
Ne nhyerɛmma di mu ma hann;   
Sɛnea ɔhy'rɛn ahoɔfɛ mu    
Na N'atrae yɛ fɛ fɛ!

 **3**   
Bra, anuonyam da kɛse no,    
B'rč a 'sase bɛte Ne gye nka   
Na 'man ny'naa sųro Ne din;    
Ͻno na nnipa mma bɛpaem   
Aka N'ahokeka kronkron    
Ne Ne nkwagye dom no.

title: Daa Nyamč a Wo Tumi Kura
markdown:
**1**   
Daa Nyamč a Wo tumi kura    
Nhwiren ne ns'romma mu,   
Wo a W'anim nni b're nni beae,    
'Ky'riky'ri anaa bɛnkyɛe,   
Ananafo, ahɔhobea,    
Na 'bofra bi nyera:   
Brɛ yɛn W'ad'yifo nokwafo    
Na wɔmmɛgye 'man ny'naa.

 **2**   
Nokware Nyamč a nyansapɛ    
Hwehwɛ W' na 'kra som Wo,   
Hy'rɛn nokware adwen biaram'    
Wɔ 'sase biara so:   
Pam sum a efi atorɔ,    
Mfomsode ne sųro mu,   
Kosi sɛ ɔsoro nyansa    
Bɛhy'rɛn ɔbra kwan so.

 **3**   
Nyamč a W'ahoɔfɛ da adi    
Wɔ nnipa 'dwinne mu   
Kasa a wɔde to dwom mu,    
Komam' kronkronyɛ mu:   
Ky'rɛ yɛn ma yɛmpo efi ny'naa,    
Ne akyinnyegye ny'naa   
Kosi sɛ yebehu dɛw a    
Ͻwɔ 'brabɔ pa mu.

 **4**   
Nyamč a Wo trenee ne Wo dom    
Dá adi Wo Ba Kristom'   
Nea Ne bra ne wu yi Wo ky'rɛ    
Nea ɔyɛɛ W'apɛde;   
Boa ma yɛntrɛw W'ahenni nom'    
Kosi sɛ 'tan begyae,   
Na 'yamye atra koma mu    
Na 'sase 'nya 'somdwoe!

title: Mo Awɛmfo Ne 'Kronkronfo
markdown:
**1**   
Mo Awɛmfo ne 'kronkronfo,   
Hann abɔfokuw ne nhengua,   
Monto dɛw dwom, Haleluya!   
Monteam, tumidi ahorow,   
'Bɔfo mpanin ne nnwontofo;

 **Nnyeso**   
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya,   
Haleluya, Haleluya!

 **2**   
Wo a Wok'rɔn sen kerubim   
Na W'anuonyam sen serafim,   
Boa wɔn 'yeyim' Haleluya!   
Wo a Wokura daá Asɛm no,   
ɔdɛɛfo pa, ma 'W'rade so.

 **3**   
'Dɔfo, momma yɛmfa 'nigye   
Nto soro nnwom mma ennyigye,   
Haleluya, Haleluya!   
Mma Nyame Agya, Nyame Ba   
Ne Nyame Honhom, Baasak'ro.

title: Wiase'i Yɛ M'Agya De
markdown:
**1**   
Wiase'i yɛ m'Agya de,    
Mete m'asom pefee,   
Abɔde nnwom a ɛwoso    
Ne nnwom a efi s'ro;   
Wiase'I yɛ m'Agya de,    
Esi pi m'adwen mu,   
Sɛ mmotan, nnua, po ne ewim'    
Yɛ Ne nsaanodwuma.

 **2**   
Wiase'i yɛ m'Agya de,    
'Wim nnomaa towɔn nnwom,   
Anɔpa hann ne sukooko,    
Yi wɔn Yɛfo n'ayɛ;   
Wiase'I yɛ m'Agya de,    
ɔhy'rɛn neá ɛyɛ nyinaam'   
ɔnam mframa a ɛbɔ mu    
Kasa ky'rɛ m' baabiara.

 **3**   
Wiase'i yɛ m'Agya de,    
O, mma me w'rɛ mmfi da,   
Sɛ mfomso kɔ so dɛn ará a    
Onyankopɔn di hen'   
Wiase'i yɛ m'Agya de,    
Dɛn nti na me w'rɛ how,   
'W'rade yɛ Hen', ma s'ro nwoso    
Na asase nni dɛw.

title: Ade a Ͻyɛ Fɛ Ny'naa
markdown:
**1**Ade a ɛyɛ fɛ nyinaa,   
 ‘Bɔde ‘kɛse, nkumaa,   
 Nneɛma a ɛyɛ nwanwa,   
 Nyame n' Ͻyɛɛ ne ny’naa.

  **2**   
Nɔhw'ren biará a emu bue,    
Nnoma a wɔto dwom,   
Cbɔɔ wɔn ahoɔfɛ mu,    
Maa wɔn ntaban nkumaa.

 **3**   
Afasebire bepɔ,   
Asu a ɛresen,    
Owitoe ne anɔpa   
A ɛhyerɛn ewim.

 **4**   
Awɔb'rem mframa nwin'nwin',    
Ahuhub'rem owia,   
Nnuaba a ab're turom,   
ɔ'na ɔyɛɛ ne ny'naa.

 **5**   
ɔmaa yɛn aniwa ne    
Anofafá a yɛde   
Bɛka Nyame, Nea ɔyɛɛ    
'De ny'naa yie n' kɛseyɛ.

title: Abɔde a Ͻwɔ Hɔ Ny'naa
markdown:
**1**   
Abɔde a ɛwɔ hɔ ny'naa   
Ka wɔn Bɔfo ayeyi ky'rɛ;   
Nyame nsaandwuma biara   
Ky'rɛ sɛnea Osi som bo fa.

 **2**   
ɔdom a ɔde gyee yɛn mu   
Na yehu N'anuonyam kɛse;   
ɔtwee yɛn kɔɔ 'sɛnnua no so,   
De mogya dehye no gyee yɛn.

 **3**   
Ͻha na Ne din ny'naa di mu,   
Adwen' ntum' nhu, nyansa ntum' nky'rɛ   
Nea ɛyɛ kɛse sen 'yinom ɔ    
Ne tumi, nyansa, ne Ne dɔ.

 **4**   
Yɛbɛbɔ Ne din no daa daa,   
De nne a nnipá aso ntee da   
Ne 'bɔfo akamfo 'Guammaa n'   
Asom N'Agya 'hengua anim.

title: Sutɔ Ama Nhw'ren Apae
markdown:
**1**   
Sutɔ ama nhw'ren apae    
'Dekyee renyan ntɛm so,   
Nea nkwa wom ny'naa de tumi    
Rep're kɔ hann no ho;   
Awɔ dennen noatwam    
ɔpɛb're no atwam,   
'Fifide nkumaa pue fam,    
Na enyin ɔhare so.

 **2**   
Nɔ habamma ne nnua a    
Ekisaa 'pɛb'rem no,    
Asan anya 'habammon'    
Na enyin 'nika mu;   
Ahoɔfɛ hyɛ wiase ma,    
Sikasu nso wom bi;   
Nɔhw'ren yɛ frɔmm mmepɔ so,    
Na sare di ahim.

 **3**   
Ͻda pa biara mu no    
Nyame yi Ne hō adi;   
Na N'akwan ny'naa mu yɛ fɛ    
Sɛ wiase a Wahy'ra:   
B'rč a ɔreyɛ asase    
Fof'ro sɛ 'dwumfo wɔ   
Ne dom fof'royɛ mu yi,    
Ma yɛnhwehwɛ nkanyan.

title: ɔsoro Ntremu Kɛse No
markdown:
**1**   
ɔsoro ntremu kɛse no,    
Nea ɛky'rɛ ahosu fɛfɛ,   
Na ɛde soro nkanea hy'rɛn,    
Ͻka wɔn mfiase tebea ky'rɛ.   
Owia a ɛnhome da no    
Yi ne Bɔfo no tumi ky'rɛ   
Na ɛma asase biara    
Hu Otumfo nsaanodwuma.

 **2**   
B'rč a adesae fi ase no,    
ɔsram toa 'nwanwadwuman' so;    
Na 'nadwo biara no, ɛka    
N'awo ho asɛm ky'rɛ sase,   
B'rč a ne ho nsoromma ny'naa hy'rɛn    
Na nsase horow ny'naa nso di    
Anwanwasɛm no ho 'danse    
De trɛw nokwasɛm nom' mmaa ny'naa.

 **3**   
Dɛn ná ɛnantew kommyɛ na    
Etwa asase ho yi?   
Dɛn na enni nnyigyei biara    
B'rč a ɛhy'rɛn fa n'a kwan so no?   
Ne ny'naa di ah'rusi kɛse    
De nne a anuonyam wɔ mu   
Na ɛto dwom b'rč a ɛhy'rɛn sɛ,    
'ɔsoro nsa na ɛyɛɛ yɛn'.

title: Ewim Abɔde Kɔntɔnkrɔn
markdown:
**1**   
Ewim abɔde kɔntɔnkrɔn    
Ne ahintasɛm W'ra,   
Ͻyɛ W'adebɔ tumi mu    
Na yɛn ahoɔden fi

 **2**   
W'adwen mu na 'bɔde ny'naa fi,    
Yɛɛ mfiasede biara,   
Na awo ntoatoaso biaram'    
'W'ra, W'at'rimpɔ dā adi.

 **3**   
Wobɔɔ 'nipa Wo suban so,    
Ewom bɔne sɛee no;   
Nso Woyɛɛ nkwagye nhyehyɛe a    
Wode bɛgye ne kra.

 **4**   
Ma yenhu Wo nokware no    
Ne Wo pɛ ho 'hoɔden;   
Kosi sɛ 'dɔ a yɛn kra hwehwɛn'    
Bɛhyɛ yɛn ma koraa.

title: So Wubetum' Akan Ns'romma
markdown:
**1**   
So wubetum' akan ns'romma    
A ɛhy'rɛn wim anadwo?   
Wubetum' akan mununkum    
A ɛretwam wɔ ewim?   
Nyame de, Onim wɔn dodow,    
'Fisɛ ɔntɔ nko na ɔnna;   
ɔno na ɔbɔɔ wɔn ny'naa    
ɔno na ɔbɔɔ wɔn ny'naa.

 **2**   
So wubetum' akan nnomaa    
A wotu wɔ ewim yi?   
Wubetum' akan mpataa no    
A wogu nsuten ny'naa mu?   
Awurade Nyame ama    
Abɔde nyinaa din nk'ronk'ro,   
ɔno na ɔmaa wɔn din,    
ɔno na ɔmaa wɔn din.

 **3**   
So wunim mmofra dodow a    
Wɔde 'nigye nyan 'nɔpa?   
Wubetum' asusu nne a    
Wɔde to nnwom da biara?   
Nyame te wɔn nigye nne a    
Wɔde to ayeyi nnwom no;   
Na ɔdɔ wɔn mu biara,    
Na ɔdɔ wɔn mu biara.

title: Nyame Bɛhwe Wo So
markdown:
**1**   
Mmaw' bo nntu, nea 'besi biara    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so;   
Tra Ne dɔ ntaban no ase,    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so.

 **Nnyeso**   
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so   
Wɔ da biara, akwan ny'naa mu   
ɔbɛhwɛ wo so yie;   
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so.

 **2**   
ɔbra nnwuma ma wo bo tų a    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so;   
Sɛ mmusu ba w'akwan mu a,    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so.

 **3**   
ɔbɛma wo nea ehia wo ny'naa    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so;   
ɔremfa hwee nkame wo da    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so.

 **4**   
Sɛ sɔhwɛ no te dɛn arā a,    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so,   
ɔkra brefo, twer' Ne kokom,    
Nyame bɛhwɛ wo so.

title: Wo Nokwar'di Dɔɔso
markdown:
**1**   
Wo nokwar'di dɔɔso, O m'Agya Nyame,   
Adanedane sunsum nniWo mu;   
Wonsakra da, Wo mmɔb'rɔhun nso nsa da,   
Sɛnea Wote tete n', Wote saa daa.

 **Nnyeso**   
Wo nokwar'di dɔɔso   
Wo nokwar'di dɔɔso,   
Anɔpa biara minyaW' dom fofro;   
Nea mihia nyinaa manya afri Wo nsam,   
Wo nokwar'di dɔɔso me so, Wura.

 **2**   
'Huhub're nč awɔb're, 'gub're ne 'twab're.   
Owia ne ɔsram ne ns'romma wɔ wim,   
Ne abɔde nyinaa di adanse wɔ   
Wo nokwar'di, Wo dom, ne Wo dɔ ho.

 **3**   
Bɔne faf'ri ne daa asomdwoe fri Wo;   
Woka me hō a minya 'nigye kwaky'rɛ;   
Nnɛ ahoɔden ne ɔkyena 'nidaso,   
Nhyira a Wode ma no dɔɔso pii.

title: ɔs'ro Agya Dɛɛfo No Mma
markdown:
**1**   
ɔs'ro Agya dɛɛfo no mma   
Boa wɔn ano Ne kokom dwoo;   
Nnomaa anaa s'ro nsoromma   
Nnya 'hintabea a ɛte saa.

 **2**   
Nyame no ara yɛn' Ne de;   
Wɔyɛ frɔmm Ne dɔ kronkron nom'   
ɔgye wɔn fi mmusu ny'naa mu   
ɔsoa wɔn Ne tum' basa so.

 **3**   
Nɔkwa anaa owu ntumi   
Ntetew 'W'rade ne Ne mma mu;   
Ohwie Ne dom no gu wɔn so,   
Na Onim wɔn aw'rɛhow ny'naa.

 **4**   
Momfa dɛw nkamfo Aw'rade;   
Mo Hwɛfo ntɔ nko na ɔnna;   
Mo Banbɔfo no pɛ mu no,   
'Tamfo biara bedi nkogu.

 **5**   
Sɛ ɔma o, sɛ ɔfa o,   
Onyame werɛ mfi Ne mma;   
Ne dɔ botae ara ne sɛ   
ɔbɛma wɔn ayɛ kronkron.

title: Mmepɔ a Atwā Ahyia Yi Na Mema
markdown:
**1**   
Mmepɔ a atwā ahyia yi na mema M'ani so ky'rɛ?   
Hefa na me nkwagye befi aba? Efi hefa?   
Me mmoa fi Awurade Nyame nkyɛn,   
Nyame a ɔbɔɔ s'ro ne asase.

 **2**   
ɔremma wo nan nwat'ri ara da, Wubedi yie.   
ɔrentɔ nko na ɔrenná ara da, Nea ɔhwɛw' no.   
Hwɛ yɛn Awurade Nyame no nko,   
Nea ɔhwɛ Israel wɔ kronkronyɛm' no.

 **3**   
Yehowa n'ara ne wo Hwɛfo no, Wo nwini no;   
Yehowa ankasa ne wo banbɔ, Wo nifa so;   
Owia renhye wo awiabere mu,   
Na ɔsram nso renhye wo anadwo.

 **4**   
Obeyi wo kra 'fi mmusu biaram', Bɔne biaram';   
Yehowa bɛhwɛ w'adifi nyinaa, New' fi ba so.   
Nea yɛdo No no, ɔbɛhwɛ wo so,    
ɔbɛkora wo so de kosi daa.

title: Nyame, Yɛn Tete Boafo Pa
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame, yɛn tete boafo pa   
Ne yɛn anidaso;   
Ahohia mu yɛn guankɔbea   
Ne yɛn daa daapem fie.

 **2**   
W'ahengua no nwini ase   
Na yɛbɛtra dwoodwoo;   
Wo basa nko na ɛyɛ den   
Na ɛbɔ yɛn ho ban.

 **3**   
Wonnya nyii mmepɔ adi no,   
Wɔnyɛɛ asase no;   
Wufi tete yɛ Nyankopɔn   
De kosi daa nyinaa.

 **4**   
W'anim mf'rihyia apem te sɛ   
Anwumm're a atwam;   
Ne tia te sɛ ade rekye   
B're a owia repue.

 **5**   
Mmere te sɛ asubɔnten   
'Soa ne mma de wɔn kɔ;   
Wotu aw'rɛfrim kɔ sɛ dae   
Wie sa wɔ adekyeem'.

 **6**   
Nyame, yɛn tete boafo pa   
Ne yɛn anidaso;   
Yɛ yɛn 'wɛmfo nkwa nna yi mu   
Ne yɛn daa daapem fie.

title: Me Hwɛfo Bɛma M'ahiade
markdown:
**1**   
Me Hwɛfo bɛma m'ahiade,   
Yehowa ne Ne din;   
Ogyaw me kɔ 'didibea frɔmm   
Nsu a ɛho dwo ho.   
ɔde me san ba trenee mu   
Sɛ mefom N'akwan a;   
Ne mmɔb'rɔhun nti, Ogyaw me   
Kɔ nokware kwan so.

 **2**   
Sɛ menam 'wu sunsuma mų a   
Woka me ho wɔ hɔ;   
Wo home mu asɛm biako   
Pam me suro nyinaa.   
Wode Wo nsa siesie ɔpon   
Ma me, m'atamfō anim;   
Me nhy'ra k'ruwa yɛ ma bu so,   
Wode ngo fɔ me t'rim.

 **3**   
Nnepá a me Nyame asiesie   
Di m'akyi, me nna ny'naa;   
O' ma Wo fie nyɛ me atrae,   
Na minyi W'ayɛ daa.   
Ͻhɔ na menya home pa   
B'rč a 'binom kɔ ba no;   
Merenyɛ ɔhɔho bi bio,   
Na mmom sɛ 'ba wɔ fie.

title: Monto Yehowa 'Yeyi Dwom!
markdown:
**1**   
Monto Yehowa 'yeyi dwom!   
Ayeyi ny'naa wɔ No;   
Nea ɔde dom twe yɛn nna mu,   
Na ɔma yɛn nnwom pa,   
Na ɔma yɛn nnwom pa.

 **2**   
Ne dom no ama yɛn afa   
Afe fof'ro mu bio;   
Yɛde bɔhyɛ ne nnwom fof'ro   
Ba yɛn Nyame anim,   
Ba yɛn Nyame anim.

 **3**   
Nyankopɔn, Woayɛ yɛn adɔe   
Ama yɛn nhwɛso pa;   
Yɛnam Wo Ba no so de nea   
Yɛwɔ nyinaa brɛ Wo,   
Yɛwɔ nyinaa brɛ Wo.

title: Munyi Yɛn Nyankopɔn Ayɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Munyi yɛn Nyankopɔn ayɛ;   
N'akwan yɛ adɔe ne nokwar',   
Nyame na 'nwanwade wɔ No,   
Monka N'adɔe mo nnwonto mu.

 **2**   
Monkamfo aw'ra mu Wura;   
Monhyɛ ahen mu Hen' 'nuonyam;   
N'adɔe no bɛtra hɔ daapem   
B'rč a 'w'ra ne ahen' nni hɔ bio.

 **3**   
ɔde tumi somaa ne Ba   
Sɛ ɔmmɛgye yɛn mfi sum mu;   
Nyame na 'nwanwade wɔ No,   
Monka N'adɔe mo nnwonto mu.

 **4**   
ɔky'rɛ yɛn 'nammɔn kwan fam ha,   
De yɛn kɔ N'agua no anim;   
N'adɔe no bɛtra hɔ daapem   
B'rč a wiase yi nni hɔ bio no.

title: Nyame Nam Ahintasɛm So
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame Nam Ahintasɛm So   
N'ɔyɛ N'anwanwade;   
ɔde N'anammɔn sisi pom',   
ɔnante ahum so.

 **2**   
Mo ahotefo, munnsuro   
Mununkum huhu no,   
Mmɔb'rɔhun' wom, na ɛbɛtew   
De nhyira ama mo.

 **3**   
Mommpɛ ntɛm mmmu Aw'rade ntɛn,   
Mmom, montwere Ne dom;   
Na kwan a emu yɛ yaw no   
Bɛdan anigye kwan.

 **4**   
N'atirimpɔ bɛba mu ntɛm   
Dɔnhwerew biara mu;   
Sɛ mfiase yɛ nwene mpo a   
Awiei no bɛyɛ dɛ.

 **5**   
Akyinnyefo bɛfom ɔkwan,   
Wɔrenhu Ne nnwumam';   
Nyame n' ɔte N'akwan aseɔ   
ɔbɛky'rɛ mu pefee.

title: ɔdom Nwanwa! Nne a Ͻgyee
markdown:
**1**   
ɔdom nwanwa! nne a ɛgyee   
'Manehun'fo sɛ me!   
Mey'rae, wɔahu m', ani furae,   
Ͻnnɛ mihu ade.

 **2**   
'Dom de sųro hyɛɛ me koma mu'   
'Dom ara tuu sųro no;   
Sɛnea saa 'dom no som me bo   
B're a migye dii no.

 **3**   
Aw'rade de yie ahyɛm' bɔ   
N'asɛm hyɛm' gyidi de;   
ɔbɛyɛ me kyɛm ne kyɛfa,   
Me nkwa nna nyinaa mu.

 **4**   
Menam amane ne asian   
Ne haw mu na maba;   
'Dom na ɛde me adu ha   
'Dom de me bedu fie.

 **5**   
Sɛ yedi mfe mpem du wɔ hɔ,   
Na yɛhy'rɛn sɛ owiá a   
Yɛwɔ nna pii yi Nyamč ayɛ   
Sɛ b'rč a yɛhyɛɛ ase no.

title: Yɛn Aw'rade Dɔfo Dom
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛn Aw'rade dɔfo dom nwanwa,   
ɔdom a ɛb'ro yɛn bɔne so,   
A wohwie guu Kalbre bepɔ so   
'Hɔ na wohwiee 'Guammaa mogya gui.

 **Nnyeso**   
'Dom, 'dom (anwanwa dom)   
'S'ro 'dom ('dom a ɛnsa)   
'Dom a ɛde bɔn' kyɛ, tew yɛn mu;   
'Dom, 'dom (anwanwa dom)   
'S'ro 'dom ('dom a ɛnsa)   
'Dom a ɛb'ro bɔne nyinaa so.

 **2**   
Bɔne ne abasamtu te sɛ   
'S'rɔkye de ɔy'ra huna kra no;   
ɔdom kɛse, nea enni kabea   
Kyerɛ yɛn guankɔbea 'sɛnnua no.

 **3**   
ɔdom nwanwa a enni kabea,   
Wɔde ma nea ɔgye di no kwa!   
Mo a morep're ahu N'anim,   
So mobɛgye Ne dom no seesei?

title: Nyame Ahummɔb'rɔ
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame ahummɔb'rɔ   
Sen 'fa wiase ny'naa;   
Na Ne frankaa no hy'rɛn   
N'asafo anim.   
Ͻtrɛw anuonyam mu,   
Te sɛ ɔsoro;   
Nkonimdi kɛse mu,   
Ne daa dɔ no hy'rɛn.

 **2**   
'Huhub're wia rebɔ   
'Sase ne 'po so;   
Anigye hann no hy'rɛn   
Nneɛma ny'naa so kwa;   
B'ribiara dė 'h'rusi   
Wɔ ne hann no mu;   
Asase ne mpempem   
Nto ayeyi nnwom.

 **3**   
'Wura, hwie Wo hann pa   
Gu y'anif'rae so;   
Wo dɔ ayamye nti,   
Yɛbɛdɔ Wo pii;   
Na sɛ mununkum si kabii wɔ ewim,   
Na anim kata a,   
Agya, twiw bɛn yɛn.

 **4**   
Yɛrennye Wo ho kyim,   
Wo hann sie mpo a;   
Wunnim' a nkwa d'ru sum,   
'Wu yɛ hann Wo nkyɛn;   
Hann mu hann hy'rɛn yɛn so,   
Yɛn 'kwantu yi mu,   
Di yɛn anim kodu Dá enni awiei.

title: M'agya Nyankopɔn Yɛ Tumfo
markdown:
**1**   
M'agya Nyankopɔn yɛ Tumfo   
Worentum' nnye ho kyim;   
Nyame a ɔyɛ 'nwanwade,   
Yehu wɔ wim nyinaa.

 **Nnyeso**   
Anwanwa kwan so na ɔyɛɛ s'ro nsoromma,   
Anwanwa kwan so na ɔdee wiase tim hɔ.   
Na ɔgyee me kra nkwa tew me ho no de,   
ɔde 'dɔ ne 'dɔm nwanwa na ɛyɛe.

 **2**   
N'anuonyam no da adi ha,   
Nanso yɛretum' nhu;   
N'anwanwa tumi no nyinaa,   
Ͻbɛfa daa daapem.

 **3**   
Ky'rɛw Kronkron no ka Ne tumi   
Ne Ne nyansa ky'rɛ yɛn;   
Nnomaa nketewa ne nhwiren   
Di Ne ho adanse.

title: Momma Yɛmfa 'Hosɛpɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Momma yemfa 'hosɛpɛ   
Nyė 'W'rade ayɛ n'Oye.   
Na N'adɔe bɛtra hɔ daa   
Esi pi, 'yɛ nokwar

 **2**   
Ne tumi kɛse mu no,   
ɔde hann hyɛ wiase ma.   
Na N'adɔe bɛtra hɔ daa   
Esi pi, 'yɛ nokware

 **3**   
ɔyɛn 'teasefo nyinaa,   
ɔma wɔn nea ehia wɔn.   
Na N'adɔe bɛtra hɔ daa   
Esi pi, 'yɛ nokware

 **4**   
Enti yɛmfa 'hosɛpɛ   
Nyė 'W'rade ayɛ n'Oye.   
Na N'adɔe bɛtra hɔ daa   
Esi pi, 'yɛ nokware

title: Sɛnea 'F'rote P're Hwehwɛ Nsu
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛnea 'f'rote p're hwehwɛ nsu   
Brč a wɔrepam no no;   
Sɛ me kra hwehwɛ Wo Nyame,   
Ne W'adɔe nso ne no.

 **2**   
Me Nyamč a Wote ase daa,   
Me kra b'rɛfo hia Wo;   
O da bɛn na mehu W'anim,   
Wo Tweaduampɔn Nyame.

 **3**   
Me kra, dɛn nti na woaboto?   
Nya 'nidaso na to   
Wo Nyankopɔn ayeyi dwom ɔ   
W'ahoɔden nsuti no.

 **4**   
Agya, ɔba, Honhom Kronkron,   
Nyame a yɛsom No;   
Anuonyam nka Wo fi seesei   
De kosi afebɔɔ.

title: Onyankopɔn Adɔe Mu Trɛw
markdown:
**1**   
Onyankopɔn adɔe mu trɛw,   
Emu trɛw te sɛ ɛpo,   
Ayamye wɔ N'atemmu mu,   
Na ɛkyɛn ahofadi.

 **2**   
Wɔma 'debɔnyɛni 'kwaaba,   
'Papafo nya ɔdom pii;   
Adɔe wɔ Agyenkwa no hɔ,   
'Yar'sa wɔ Ne mogya nom'.

 **3**   
Onyankopɔn dɔ no mu bae   
Sen nipā adwen susubea;   
Tetekwaframoa no komam'   
Wɔ 'yamyč a ɛyɛ nwanwa.

 **4**   
Sɛ yɛn dɔ turodoo a,   
Yɛrennye N'asɛm ho 'kyim;   
Na yɛn bra mu bɛhyerɛn hann   
Wɔ yɛn 'W'rade 'hoɔfɛ mu.

title: O Bra, O Bra Immanuel
markdown:
**1**   
O bra, O bra Immanuel,   
Na bɛpɔn Israel nneduafo   
A wɔresu nnommumfam' ha,   
Kosi sɛ Nyame Ba bepue.

 **Nnyeso**   
Di dɛ, di dɛ, Immanuel   
Bɛba wo nkyɛn, O Israel!

 **2**   
O bra, Wo ɔsoro nyansa,   
Bɛtoto nneɛma nyinaa yie;   
Bɛkerɛ yɛn nimdeɛ kwan no,   
Na ma yɛmfa dɛw nnante so.

 **3**   
O bra, aman anidaso,   
Na bɛka nnipa nyinaa bom;   
Ma nitan ne ɔko to ntwa.   
Fa s'ro 'somdwoe hyɛ wiase ma.

title: Wɔwoo No Agya No Dɔ Mu
markdown:
**1**   
Wɔwoo No Agya no dɔ mu   
Ansa na ɔbɔɔ wiase;   
ɔne Alfa ne Omega;   
Mɔfiase ne awiei no.   
Nneemá a ɛwɔ hɔ, nea atwam,   
Ne nea daakye yebehu   
Daapem ne daapem nyinaa.

 **2**   
ɔs'rofo nyinaa monsom No,   
Abɔfo nto N'ayeyi;   
Tumi nyinaa nkoto N'anim,   
Momma yɛn Nyame Hen' so   
Ͻnsɛ sɛ tɛkrɛma yɛ komm.   
Ͻnne nyinaa mmom nto dwom   
Daapem ne daapem nyinaa.

 **3**   
Kristo, Wo ne Agya Nyame,   
Ne Wo, Honhom Kronkron no   
Yɛde nnwonto, ne aseda,   
Ne yɛn ayeyi ma Mo;   
'Nidi, 'nuonyam ne ahenni   
Ne nkonimdi yɛ Mo de   
Daapem ne daapem nyinaa.

title: Yɛn Nyamč a Wɔawo No
markdown:
**1**   
Yɛn Nyamč a wɔawo No,   
Yɛde mpaebɔ kyea No;   
Na yɛde nnwonto hyia No kwan   
Sɛ Ommedi hene.

 **2**   
'Ba a ɔtč ase daa,   
Bɛmaa yɛn faw'hodi   
Enti ɔfaa akoa tebea   
De tɔɔ y'ahofadi.

 **3**   
Obepue s'ro hann nom,   
Aba sɛ Temmufo   
Abɛboa Ne nk'rɔfo ano   
Akodi hen' ɔs'ro.

 **4**   
'Yeyi nka Nyame Ba    
A ɔbɛgye yɛn nkwa   
ɔne Agya ne Honhom no   
Baakō a Wɔte hɔ daa.

title: Bųronya Da No Abɔfo No
markdown:
**1**   
Bųronya da no abɔfo no   
Ka ky'rɛɛ nguanhwɛfo wɔ sar' so;   
Wɔwɔ sar' so rehwɛ wɔn nguan,   
Awɔb'rem 'nadwo sum bi mu   
  **Nnyeso**    
Bųronya, bųronya, bųronya, bųronya,   
Wɔawo Israel Hene no.

 **2**   
Wɔhwɛɛ soro huu ns'romma bi   
Sɛ ɛhy'rɛn apuei aky'riky'ri,   
Na ɛmaa 'sase hy'rɛn kɛse,   
Ͻtoaa so awia ne 'nadwo.

 **3**   
Na saa ns'romma no hann mu no,   
Nyansafo baasa fi aky'ri bae,   
Sɛ wɔrebɛhwehwɛ hen' no.   
Na wodii ns'romma no akyi.

 **4**   
Ns'romma no bɛn 'tifi atɔe fam,   
Ͻhomee wɔ Betlehem so;   
'Hɔ na egyinae prɛko pɛ,   
Faako a na Yesu da no.

 **5**   
Nyansafo baasa no hyɛn mu,   
Na wɔde 'nidi sɔree No;   
Wɔde 'kyɛde mae N'anim hɔ:   
Sika, korɔbɔ ne 'duhwam.

title: A Bɔfō a Mufi 'Nuonyam Mu
markdown:
**1**   
Abɔfō a mufi 'nuonyam mu,   
Muntu mfa wiase nyinaa;   
Mō a motoo adebɔ ho nnwom,   
Monka 'Gyenkwa awo nky'rɛ;   
Mommra mmɛsom, mommra mmɛsom   
ɔhen' Kristō a wɔawo No.

 **2**   
Nguanhwɛfo a mowɔ sar' so,   
Rewɛn mo nguan anadwo;   
Nyame ne nnipa abɛtra,   
'Bofra no hann hy'rɛn aky'ri;   
Mommra mmɛsom, mommra mmɛsom   
ɔhen' Kristō a wɔawo No.

 **3**   
Nyansafo, munnyae adwennwen,   
Hann kɛse apue aky'ri   
Monkɔhehwɛ aman 'nidason'   
Moahu N'awo ho ns'romma;   
Mommra mmɛsom, mommra mmɛsom   
ɔhen' Kristō a wɔawo No.

 **4**   
Ahotefo a moakoto   
Rewɛn 'nidaso ne sųrom    
Awurade besian mpófrim   
Aba N'asɔrefie hɔ;   
Mommra mmɛsom, mommra mmɛsom   
ɔhen' Kristō a wɔawo No.

title: Dwom Bi Wɔ Ewim Hɔ!
markdown:
**1**   
Dwom bi wɔ ewim hɔ!   
Ns'romma bi wɔ ewim!   
Ͻna bi rebɔ mpae, 'Kokoaa bi resu brɛoo!   
Na ns'romma no hyerɛn b'rč a 'hoɔfɛfo to dwom,   
Wɔawo ɔhen' wɔ Betlehem mmoa 'didibea!

 **2**   
Ah'rusi rekɔ so Awo nwanwa no ho,   
'Fisɛ 'babanin no Yɛ wiase Aw'rade.   
Yiw, ns'romma no hyerɛn b'rč a 'hoɔfɛfo to dwom,   
Wɔawo ɔhen' wɔ Betlehem mmoa 'didibea!

 **3**   
Ns'romma no hann no mu   
Na wiase 'hoɔfe wɔ;   
Dwom no fi aky'riky'ri, Afa wiase nyinaa;   
Wɔasɔ gya biará ano na 'hoɔfefo to dwom   
Aman ne afie mu sɛ Yesu yɛ ɔhen'!

 **4**   
Yedi 'h'rusi hann nom',   
Na yesi dwom no so, Nea ɛba anadwo   
Fi s'ro dɔm no nkyɛn no,   
Yiw! Yɛbɔ ose wɔ wɔn asɛmpa no ho,   
Na yɛkyea yɛn 'Gyenkwa ne Hen' nea ɔda no.

title: Monkɔla No Mmepɔ So
markdown:
**1**   
B’re a nguanhwɛfo   
Rewɛn Wɔn nguankuw ‘nadwo no,   
Hwɛ ɔsoro hɔ nyinaa,   
Hann Kronkron bi hy’rɛn hɔ.

 **Nnyeso**   
Monkɔka no mmepɔ so   
Nɔkoko so ne baabiara;   
Monkɔka no mmepɔ so   
Wɔawo Yesu Kristo**1**   
B're a nguanhwɛfo rewɛn   
Wɔn nguankuw 'nadwo no,   
Hwɛ ɔsoro hɔ nyinaa,   
Hann Kronkron bi hy'rɛn hɔ.

 **2**   
Nguanhwɛfo no ho popoe'   
B're a ɔsoro hɔ   
Abɔfo nnwom no wosoe   
Sɛ wɔawo 'Gyenkwa no!

 **3**   
Mmoa adididan bi mu,   
Wɔwoo 'kokoaa Kristo,   
De Nyame nkwagye brɛɛ yɛn   
Bųronya anɔpa no.

title: Tie! Abɔfo To Nnwom Sɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Tie abɔfo to nnwom sɛ   
'Nuonyam nka Hen' fof'ro no;   
Asomdwoe nka asase;   
Nyame ne bɔn'yefō abom;   
Aman, momfa ah'rusi   
Ne s'ro nto anigye nnwom   
Ne abɔfokuw nteam sɛ   
'Wɔawo Kristo Betlehem'.   
Tie! Abɔfo to dwom sɛ   
'Nuonyam nka Hen' fof'ro no.

 **2**   
Kristo a s'ro ny'naa som No,   
Kristo, daa Awurade;   
Wɔawo Hen' mmoa 'didibea   
B're a 'bɔfo to dwom sɛ;   
'Somdwoe nka 'sase sofo,   
Ma 'kra a wosųro nyɛ komm;   
Kristo abɛtra fam ha,   
Yesu, yɛn Immanuel.   
Tie! Abɔfo to dwom sɛ   
'Nuonyam nka Hen' fof'ro no.

 **3**   
Mommɔ 'se mma 'Somdwoe Hen'!   
Mommɔ Trenee Wia no 'se!   
ɔde nkwa ne hann aba,   
'Yar'sa wɔ Ne ntaban mu.   
Ogyaa N'anuonyam wɔ s'ro,   
Bae, sɛnea nnipa renwu.   
ɔrebenyan nnipa mma   
Ama wɔn awofof'ro.   
Tie! Abɔfo to dwom sɛ   
'Nuonyam nka Hen' fof'ro no

title: Sɛ Tetefo De 'Nigye
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛ tetefo de 'nigye   
Hwɛɛ ns'romma kwanky'rɛf no,   
Sɛ wɔgyee ne hann 'nigyem,   
Na ɛhyerɛn ky'rɛɛ wɔn kwan,   
Saa na Aw'rade domfo,   
Kyerɛ yɛn Wo nkyɛn kwan daa.

 **2**   
Sɛnea wɔde dɛw nantew   
Kɔɔ W'ahobrɛase mpa ho,   
Kobuu W'anim nkotodwe ɔ   
Wo a s'ro ne fam som Wo;   
Saa'ra na ma yɛmfa dɛw   
Mmra Wo dom agua n'anim.

 **3**   
Sɛ wɔde aboɔdenne   
Brɛɛ Wo mmoa 'dididem' no,   
Saa na ma yɛmfa 'nigye   
Kronkron a bɔne bi nnim   
Mfa yɛn ademude pa   
Mmrɛ Wo Kristo, yɛn s'ro Hen'.

 **4**   
Yesu Kronkron, da biara   
Fa vɛn fa kwan hihiaa nom'.   
Na sɛ fam nneɛma twam a,   
Fa 'kra a wɔagye wɔn bra   
Nea ns'romma kwanky'rɛfo nhia,   
Na 'wisiw nsɛe W'anuonyam.

title: Mmoa Adididan Mu, Wannya Mpa Biara
Wiase Nni Dɛw
markdown:
**1**   
Wiase nni dɛw, Aw'radč aba   
Ma 'sase nnye ne Hen';   
Ma koma biara nhwɛ No kwan,   
S'ro ne 'sase nto dwom.

 **2**   
'Sase nni dɛw, 'Gyenkwa di hen';   
Ma nnipa mma nto dwom   
B're a mfuw, nsuy'ri ne mmepɔ   
De 'nigye dwom gye so.

 **3**   
Ma bɔne ne 'w'rɛhow to ntwa,   
Na nsɔe mfi 'sase so;   
ɔreba 'ma nhyirá abu so,   
Nea nnome wɔ biara.

 **4**   
ɔde nokwar' ne dom di hen',   
Ná aman nyinaa behu   
Ne trenee no mu anuonyam,   
Ne N'anwanwa dɔ no.

title: Awɔb're No Mfimfin'
markdown:
**1**   
Awɔb're no mfimfin', Mframa nwin'nwin' bɔe   
Fam yɛɛ den sɛ dade, Nsu yɛɛ den sɛ bo;   
Sukɔtweaa tɔɔ kɛse, Ͻtɔɔ kɛse gui,   
Awɔb're no mfimfin' Tete b'rem'

 **2**   
Na abɔfo dɔm pii Ahyia mu wɔ hɔ,   
Kerubim, Serafim Hyiaa mu wɔ 'wim hɔ;   
Nanso Ne na no de, N'anigye mu no,   
ɔsɔree Dɔfo no, Few N'ano.

 **3**   
Dɛn na memfa mma No, Ohiani sɛ me?   
Sɛ meyɛ guanhwɛfō a 'Nka mɛma 'guammaa;   
Sɛ meyɛ nyansafō a 'Nka meyɛm' fam' de,   
Dɛn na metum' ama? Me Koma.

title: Kokoaa Kronkron, 'Hobrɛasefo
markdown:
**1**   
Kokoaa Kronkron, 'hobrɛasefo,   
Ne mpa yɛ mmoa 'didibea;   
'Nantwi resu a wonnim sɛ   
'Bofra Kristo yɛ 'W'rade;   
Nnomaa retu, 'bɔfo to dwom   
'Dwonto gyigye, wɔte nsɛmpa,   
'Bofra Kristo yɛ 'W'rade   
'Bofra Kristo yɛ 'W'rade.

 **2**   
Na nguan reda brč a nguanhwɛfo   
Rewɛn kosi 'dekyee no;   
Wohuu 'nuonyam, tee asɛm no,   
Asɛmpa no nkrasɛm no;   
Wodii 'h'rusė, 'w'rɛhow bi nnim,   
Wɔtoo 'yeyi dwom maa 'de kyee;   
Wɔwoo 'bofra Kristo maa w'.   
Wɔwoo 'bofra Kristo maa w'.

title: Pue, Wo ɔsoro Hann Fɛfɛ
Sɛnea Esii 'Nadwo Bi
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛnea esii 'nadwo bi,   
Awɔb're bi mu no,   
ɔsoro hann abɔfo   
Bɔɔ mu fii ase too dwom.

 **2**   
Nguanhwɛfo bi a wɔada   
Nyan hwɛɛ anuonyam no;   
Wɔde 'hodw'ri gyinaa hɔ   
Tiee abɔfo no asɛm.

 **3**   
Wɔawo 'bofra ama mo   
Wɔ mmoa adidibea;   
Wɔwoo No 'hobrɛase mu,   
ɔyɛ ɔdɔ Hen' Kronkron.

 **4**   
Abɔfo a mufi s'ro,   
Munnnyae mo dwonto da!    
Anuonyam wɔ s'ros'ro hɔ   
Dapem ne daapem nyinaa.

title: 'Nadwo Bi a Wim Atew No
markdown:
**1**   
Nadwo bi a wim atew no,   
Saa anuonyam dwom no,   
S'ro abɔfo baa fam de wɔn   
Sika sanku toe sɛ:   
Asomdwoe nka 'sase sofo,   
Mfi s'ro Hen' dɛɛfo n' hɔ,   
Na wiase nyinaa ayɛ komm   
Retie 'bɔfo dwom no.

 **2**   
Wofi s'ro a 'mu abue bac,   
De asomdwoe faa wim;   
Wɔn s'ro dwom no kɔɔ so trɛw kɔɔ   
Wiase mu baabiara.   
Wɔtrɛw wɔn ntaban mu tu faa   
Asaseta no so;   
Na nne sakasaka mu no,   
Abɔfo no too dwom.

 **3**   
Mo a ɔbra nnesoa d'rud'ru   
Ahyɛ mo so kɛse,   
Na moabrɛ nam ɔbra kwan so   
Retu yaw 'nammɔn yi;   
Monhwɛ, anigye mmere pa   
Nam wim reba ntɛm so;   
O monhome wɔ kwan no mu   
Ntie abɔfo dwom no.

title: Hwɛ Sɛnea Nhw'ren Bi Apue
markdown:
**1**   
Hwɛ sɛnea nhw'ren bi apue   
Wɔ dua mono bi so;   
Fi Yisai abusua mu,   
Tetefo de too dwom;   
Ͻbae sɛ nhw'ren fɛfɛ   
Wɔ awɔb're kɛse mu,   
Anadwo dasu mu.

 **2**   
Yesaia kaa saa nhw'ren a   
Mereka yi hō asɛm;   
Yehuu No wɔ Maria nkyɛn,   
ɔbaabun yamyefo;   
ɔwoo Agyenkwa no   
De kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn dɔ   
Anadwo dasu mu.

title: Omommra, 'Gyidifo
markdown:
**1**   
O mommra, 'gyidifo, mō a mo ho sɛpɛ mo;   
O mommra, O mommra mommra Betlehem;   
Mommra mmɛhwɛ No wɔawo abɔfo Hen'.

 **Nnyeso**   
O mommra ma yensom No,   
O mommra ma yensom No,   
O mommra ma yensom No,   
Yesu Kristo.

 **2**   
Abɔfokuw, monto, monto dwom nkamfo No,   
O mommra, mo a mote s'ro hɔ nyinaa:   
'Anuonyam wɔ soro ma Onyankopɔn'

 **3**   
Yiw, 'Wura, akwaaba, wɔawo Wo 'nɔpa yi,   
Wura Yesu, Wo na anuonyam wɔ Wo,   
Agya no Asɛm aba honam mu nnɛ.

title: Wɔawo S'ro 'Bofra Kristo Nnɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Wɔawo s'ro 'Bofra Kristo nnɛ,   
Momfa nsankuten ne mmɛnta nto dwom;   
Wɔawo s'ro 'Bofra kristo nnɛ,   
Momma yɛmfa 'nigye nto dwom.

 **2**   
Wɔwoo No mmoa 'dididan mu,   
Ne mpa a ɔdaa so yɛ mmoa aduan';   
Wɔwoo No mmoa 'dididan mu,   
Momma yɛnkoto nsɔre No.

 **3**   
Esii wɔ tete mmere mu,   
B'rč a 'nyansafo hyɛɛ Ne mmae no honkɔm;   
Esii wɔ tete mmere mu,   
'Nyansafo hyɛɛ N'awo ho nkɔm.

title: Yesu, 'Hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo
markdown:
**1**   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo,   
Woayɛ W'Agya no apɛde;   
Woagya Wo soro ahengua   
Abɛfa yɛn 'nimguase su,   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo.

 **2**   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo,   
Wode 'dɛw ahyɛ wiase ma;   
Wufi s'ro aba 'sase so,   
De aw'rɛkyekye rebrɛ yɛn,   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo.

 **3**   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo,   
Woyɛ ɔdɔ a nkekae nnim;   
Fa dɔ gya kanyan yɛn koma,   
Na yɛayɛ nea Wo koma pɛ,   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo.

 **4**   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo,   
Boa yɛn ma yɛnyɛ W'apɛde;   
Nea yɛwɔ nyinaa yɛ Wo de,   
Ma yenni Wo nokware daa,   
Yesu,'hoɔfɛfo a Wodwo.

title: O Kųro Ketewa Betlehem
markdown:
**1**   
O kųro ketewa Betlehem,   
Kųro a woda hɔ dinn!   
B're a woda wo baabi komm   
Na ns'romma twam kɔ no;   
Na wo sum mmɔnten so hɔ   
Daa hann no hyerɛn hɔ;   
Mɔfe nyinaa mu 'nidaso,   
Ahyia wo mu 'nadwo' i.

 **2**   
Maria awo Yesu Kristo,   
Na s'ro dɔm nyinaa 'hyiam;   
B're a nnipa mma ada no   
Abɔfo de dɔ wɛn.   
Anɔpa ns'romma mommom   
Nkā awo kronkron no nky'rɛ!   
Monto 'yeyi nnwom mma Nyame,   
Na 'somdwoe nka nnipa.

 **3**   
Wɔde anwanwa 'kyɛdɛ yi   
Maa Yɛn wɔ kommyɛ mu!   
Nyame de Ne soro nhyira   
'Bɛhyɛ nnipa komam;   
Aso ante Ne mmae no,   
Nanso bɔne wiase' i,   
Neá akra brɛfo bɛgye No no,   
Kristo bɛhyɛn wɔn mu.

 **4**   
Betlehem Akokoa kronkron,   
YɛsrɛW' sian bra yɛn nkyɛn;   
Pam yɛn mu bɔne na hyɛn mu,   
Ma wɔnwoW' yɛn mu nnɛ.   
Yɛte Bųronya 'bɔfo sɛ   
Wɔreka 'nigyesɛm;   
O bra na bɛtra yɛn nkyɛn ha,   
Yɛn W'ra Immanuel.

title: Kristofo, Munni Dɛw
markdown:
**1**
