title: W'asɛm No Yɛ
markdown:
**1**   
W'asɛm no yɛ   
Me nan ase kanea,   
Hann a ɛhy'rɛn me kwan so.

title: ɔs'ro Agya, Yɛbɔ Mpae Ky'rɛ Wo
Nyame Ntra Me T'rim'
Nyame Ntra Me T'rim'
Honhom Kronkron, Tie Yɛn
markdown:
**1**   
Honhom Kronkron, tie yɛn,   
Boa yɛn nnwonto yim';   
Hom' gu 'yeyi dwom a   
Yɛde ba no mu.

 **2**   
Honhom Kronkron, nyan yɛn   
Wɔ yɛn mpaebɔ mu;   
Bɛn yɛn na ky'rɛ yɛn nea   
Ͻsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ.

 **3**   
Honhom Kronkron, hyerɛn   
Yɛn nwoma yi so   
Fa nann pa a yehia   
Hyerɛn 'mu nsɛm so.

title: 'Yi Ne Da a 'W'rade Ayɛ
Sɛnea Woahyɛ Bɔ No, 'W'ra, Nnɛ
markdown:
**1**   
Sɛnea Woahyɛ bɔ no, 'W'ra, nnɛ,   
Worema W'akoa afi ha akɔ 'somdwoem'.   
M'aniwa ahuW' awia ketee   
Aman ny'naa anim, nkwagye nhyehyɛe ho,   
Adiyi hann ma amanaman no   
Ne wo man Israelfo no anuonyam.

title: Yesu, Gyina Yɛn Mu
markdown:
**1**   
Yesu, gyina yɛn mu   
Wo wusɔr' tumim';   
Ma saa som b're yi nyɛ   
B're a wɔatew ho.

 **2**   
Hom' Wo Honhom Kronkron   
Gu koma biaram';   
Pam suro ne 'w'rɛhow   
Fi ɔkra biaram'.

 **3**   
Saa na 'hokeka mu,   
Yetu yɛn kwan no;   
Wɛn kosi dā a enni   
Awiei 'nɔpa no."

title: Tie Yɛn Mpaebɔ, 'W'ra
markdown:
**1**   
Tie yɛn mpaebɔ, 'W'ra,   
Tie yɛn mpaebɔ, 'W'ra;   
Yɛ aso ma yɛn na   
Ma yɛn W'asomdwoe.   
Amen.

title: Boa Ma Mintie Wo Dɔ Ayamye
markdown:
**1**   
Boa ma mintie Wo dɔ ayamye   
no anɔpa 'fisɛ metwere Wo;   
Boa ma minhu 'kwan a mɛfa so,   
'Fisɛ mema me kra so ba Wo nkyɛn.   
Amen.

title: Hyira Yɛn Nsa 'Kyɛde Yi So
markdown:
**1**   
Hyira yɛn nsa 'kyɛde yi so,   
Hyira yɛn komam' 'dwuma so;   
Gyidi ne ɔpɛ yɛ yɛn de,   
Nea aka hyɛ wo nsa, Nyame.   
Amen.

title: Aw'rade Wɔ Ne Fie Kronkron
markdown:
**1**   
Aw'rade wɔ Ne  fie kronkron nom',   
Aw'rade wɔ Ne fie kronkron nom',   
Ma asase ny'naa nyɛ komm,   
Wɔnyɛ komm wɔ N'anim.   
Amen.

title: Ampa, Ampa, 'W'rade Aba Ha
markdown:
**1**   
Ampa, ampa, 'W'rade aba ha,   
Ampa 'bɔfo da so wɔ ha,   
Mete dwom bɔkɔɔ wɔ m'asom',   
Mete Honhom nka, minni sųro bi.

title: Da Biara Mesrɛ Nneɛma
markdown:
**1**   
Da biara mesrɛ nneɛma   
mmiɛnsa, Wura:   
Sɛ ma minhu Wo yie,    
ma mennɔ Wo yie,   
Na minni W'akyi yie da biara.

title: 'W'ra Yɛsrɛ Fa Wo Nhiyira Pɔn
Di M'anim, Di M'anim Wo
markdown:
**1**   
Di m'anim, di m'anim Wo trenee mu,   
Ma Wo kwan nyɛ petee m'anim.   
'Fisɛ ɛyɛ Wo, 'Wura, Wo nko   
Na Woma metra ase dwoo.

title: Aw'rade Wɔ Ne Fie Kronkron
markdown:
**1**   
Aw'rade wɔ Ne fie kronkron nom',   
Aw'rade wɔ Ne fie kronkron nom',   
Ma asase ny'naa nyɛ komm,   
Ma asase ny'naa nyɛ komm wɔ N'anim,   
Wɔnyɛ komm, Wɔnyɛ komm wɔ N'anim.   
Amen.

title: Agya Tumfoɔ, Tie Yɛn Mpaebɔ
markdown:
**1**   
Agya Tumfoɔ, tie yɛn mpaebɔ   
Na hy'ra akrā a wɔtwɛn   
W'anim ny'naa.   
Amen.

title: Domfo Nyame Munyi N'aye
markdown:
**1**   
Domfo Nyame munyi N' ayɛ,   
Asase mma munyi N'ayɛ,   
ɔsoro dɔm munyi N'ayɛ,   
Agya, 'Ba ne Honhom Kronkron.   
Amen.

title: Domfo Nyame Munyi N'aye
markdown:
**1**   
Domfo Nyame munyi N' ayɛ,   
Asase mma munyi N'ayɛ,   
ɔsoro dɔm munyi N'ayɛ,   
Agya, 'Ba ne Honhom Kronkron.   
Amen.

title: N1 Awake My Soul
markdown:
**1**   
Me kra, nyan anigye nnwom mu   
Yi wo Gyefo kɛsen' ayɛ;   
Mede No nnwom ka ampa'ra;   
Ne dɔ ayamye da hɔ kwa.

  **2**   
Ohui sɛ masɛe  asehwem',   
‘Yi nyinaa akyi ɔdɔɔ me;   
Ɔgyee me f'ri yera kwan so;   
Ne dɔ ayamye no so pii.

  **3**   
Sɛ atamfo tumfo dɔm pii,   
Wiase ne bonsam tia me a,   
Ɔda so ky'rɛ me kra kwanpa;   
Ne dɔ ayamye no ye pii.

  **4**   
Sɔ haw adan omununkum,   
Na aprannaa rebobom mpo~a,   
Ogyina me kra nkyɛn daa daa;   
Ne dɔ ayamye no ye pii.

  **5**   
Sɛ wiase trenee Hen' no ba,   
Bɛfa N'aponfo kɔ fie a,   
Mɛto dwom, ‘nigye mpoano hɔ;   
Ne dɔ ayamye no ho daa.

title: N2 My Heart and Voice
markdown:
**1**   
Mede koma na nne   
Ka ‘Gyenkwa ‘yeyi ky'rε-   
Ma obiara nka N'ayeyi;   
Wiase nyinaa Wura,   
N'asεm mu tumi so   
Na wɔnam bɔɔ wiase nyinaa.

  **2**   
Ɔfaa akoa tebea   
Na nipadua mu na   
Ɔsoaa yεn mmusu kɔɔ Kalbre:   
Ɔyεε afɔr'bɔde,   
Hwiee Ne mogya kronkron   
Gu de gyee bɔne mu nnomum.

  **3**   
Ankyε ɔsɔre dii   
N'atanfo so nkonim,   
De wɔn guu mpokyerε mu na   
Odw'riw wɔn ahenni,   
Maa wɔgye too mu sε:   
“Kristo di ade nyinaa so”

  **4**   
N'ahenni reba ntεm,   
Ne trenee bεda adi   
‘Sase so sεnea εyε s'ro;   
Nea oguan toa Kristo,   
Benya Ne nkyεn ɔgye,   
Na wahu Ne nkwagye nyinaa.

title: N3 All Things Praise Thee
N4 Ayeyi Nnwomto
markdown:
**1**   
Afei ayeyi nnwomto mu,   
Na mekamfo Awurade;   
Me ne ahotefo bebom' aka se:   
Yesu aye ade,   
Yesu aye~ade nyinaa yie!

 **Nnyeso**   
Na afei dwom yi bewosow,   
Ebewosow, ebewosow;   
Na dwom yi bewosow,    
Ebewosow den se:   
Yesu aye ade,   
Yesu aye~ade nyinaa yie!

  **2**   
Se obonsam de n'agyan no   
Bewowo me koma mu a,   
Mede ‘yi bepam, bepam n'abufuw:   
Yesu aye ade,   
Yesu aye~ade nyinaa yie!

  **3**   
Na se medu ‘man pa no mu,   
Na me nsa ka trabea no a,   
Me dwom yi bewosow,   
Ebewosow den se:   
Yesu aye ade,   
Yesu aye~ade nyinaa yie!

title: N5 Hark, My Soul It Is
markdown:
**1**   
Me kra, tie na Aw'rade-a;   
W'Agyenkwa no a tie N'asεm;   
Yesu si so ka ky'rε w' sε,   
“Bɔn'yεfo wodɔ Me anaa?”

  **2**   
Wodaa dua mu, Mituu wo,   
Wupirae, Meyεεw' ad'ru;   
Wobεε ko, Mehwehwεε wo,   
Memaa wo sum no dan' hann.

  **3**   
Ɔbaatan betum' agyae   
Sε ɔrenhwε ne ba bio?   
Yiw, ne w'rε betum' afi,   
Nanso Me de, Mεkae wo

  **4**   
Me dε no ɔnsakra da,   
Ɛkorɔn sen s'ro mmepɔ   
Emu dɔ sen bun nyinaa   
Emu yε den sε owu.

  **5**   
Ow'ra, me nkɔmmɔ tit'riw   
Ne sε me dɔ no yε mm'rεw,   
Nanso medɔ Wo, kotoW',   
Ma minnya dom mfa nnɔW' yie.

title: N6 The Lord Is King
markdown:
**1**   
W'rade di hen' ma wo nne so,   
Soro ne asase nni dɔw!   
‘Nigye bɔwosow mmaa nyinaa,   
Nyankopεn Tweaduampong di hen'.

  **2**   
‘W'rade di hen' mfutuma ba,   
Wiase Temmufo no tene;   
N'akwan yɔ kronkron ne nokwar',   
Abεde nyinaa nyi A'ayɔ.

  **3**   
Ahotefo mommε ‘sanku;   
Mo Agya Nyame no di hen':   
Ɛdɔɔfo no wε ne nkyɔn hε –    
Ɛdεfo a wεsɔn No no.

  **4**   
Mommɔky'rɔ mo hia ne nnesoa,   
Ɛde bɔkε ‘henguan' anim,   
Na abεfokuw retwɔn hε,   
Abε Ne dε ho amanneɔ.

  **5**   
O, sɔ Ne nyansa no tum' fom,   
Ne tumi gu, Ne dε tu a,   
Ɔnde anka Ne mma nnyae to,   
Sɔ Tweaduampεn Kwame di hen'.

title: N7 LO! God Is Here!
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame wε ha! Momma yɔnsom   
Na yenhu sɔ ha yɔ kronkron!   
Momma yɔnte Ne tumi nka   
Na yɔnkoto N'anim ha komm;   
Mo a munim sɔ Ne dom te;   
Monsom No ‘nidi ne εdεm'.

  **2**   
Nyame wε ha! Abεfo bom'   
To No dwom awia ne ‘nadwo;   
Ɛte soro nso di hene,   
Soro asafo yiN' ayɔ:    
‘Wura mpo ayeyi a yɔn   
Tɔkrɔma pemee reyi W' yi!

  **3**   
Ateasefo nyinaa Wura,   
Gye yɔn ayeyi sɔ~eduhuam;   
Na yɔagyina W'anim daa daa,   
Atie Wo, ayɔ nea Wopɔ:   
Yɔde yɔn adwen' ma  Wo sɔ   
Afεre a ɔsε ani.

title: N8 Holy Spirit
markdown:
**1**   
Honhom kwankyrɔfo pa a   
Wobɔn Kristoni nkyɔn daa,   
Sɛ yɔn nsa kyerɔ yɔn kwan   
Sare so ‘kwantu yi mu.   
Akra b'rɔfo anigye,   
B're Wo nne bɛkɛɛ no,   
Ka brɔoo sɔ “Kwantufo, bra!   
Di M'kyi, ma yɔnkɛ fie”.

  **2**   
Dɛfo bɔnkyɔe nokwafo,   
Wobɔn sɔ Wobɔboa yɔn,   
Nnyae yɔn mma ‘kyinnye ne hu,   
Mma yennka sum huhu mu;   
Ahumtu ma yesuro,   
Na anidaso pa a,   
Ka brɔoo sɔ, “Kwantofo, bra!   
Di M'akyi ma yɔnkɛ fie”.

  **3**   
Sɔ yɔn brɔ nna yi sa na   
Yɔretwen ‘home pa no,   
De mpaebɛ hwɔ soro nko,   
Dwen sɔ wɛky'rɔw yɔn din hɛ a;   
B're a yɔnam nsuy'ri mu   
Resrɔ Yesu mogyam' yi,   
Ka brɔoo sɔ “Kwantofo, bra!   
Di M'akyi, ma yɔnkɛ fie”.

title: N9 O Breath Of God
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame Honhom, hom gu yεn so,   
Yεrebɔ mpae yi tra yεn mu;   
Wone yεn hann, yεn nkwa nsuti   
Wɔ yεn asetra fof'ro yim'.

  **2**   
‘Wura. Woka yεn ho ampa,   
Nyε soro anaasε bun mu:   
Mmom yεbεte Wo nne bεnkyεe   
Wokasa ky'rε yεn honhom mu.

  **3**   
Kristo ne yεn s'ro Dimafo   
Wone yεn komam' Dimafo   
Yi bɔne akyinnye ano,   
Na fa nokware hyε yεn ma.

  **4**   
Ao, me koma yε kyinnyefo!   
Minim kwan ne Kwanky'rεfo no:   
Ao, metaa mesan akyiri,    
M'adamfo pa fa firi me.

  **5**   
Sε minnya yɔnko biara a,   
Bra na bεtra me koma mu;   
Sε ehu nso hyε me so a,   
Bεyε me werɔkyekyefo.

title: N10 Gracious Spirit Dwell
markdown:
**1**   
Ɔdom honhom´ ne me ntra,   
Na mayε ɔdomfo bi:   
Mada W´asεm a εsa   
Yare no adi me bram´,   
Na maka Kristo ho nsεm,   
Odwo ne abòɔd´ru mu.   
Ɔdom honhom´ ne me ntra,   
Na mayε ɔdomfo bi:   
Mada W´asεm a εsa   
Yare no adi me bram´,

  **2**   
Nokwar´ Honhom ne me ntra;   
Na mayε nokwafo bi:   
Ma Wo nyansa ne dom no   
Nna adi yie wɔ me bram´,   
Na mede anua-yε pa,   
Maka me Wura ho nsεm.   
Nokwar´ Honhom ne me ntra;   
Na mayε nokwafo bi:   
Ma Wo nyansa ne dom no

  **3**   
Tema honhom! Ne me ntra   
Na me nso mayε tema.   
Fa me koma sie sε nhw´ren   
Wɔ sɔhwe sum bere mu   
´Wia pue a, bue pon no mu,   
Ma wɔnte Ne dɔ hua no.   
Tema honhom! Ne me ntra   
Na me nso mayε tema.   
Fa me koma sie sε nhw´ren   
Wɔ sɔhwe sum bere mu

  **4**   
Honhom Tumfo! ne me ntra;   
Na mayε otumfo bi:   
Na matumi magyina,   
Nea ankonam di nkogu;   
Anidaso pa mu daa,    
Na makɔ m´anim ara.   
Honhom Tumfo! ne me ntra;   
Na mayε otumfo bi:   
Na matumi magyina,

  **5**   
Honhom Kronkron ne me ntra;   
Na mayε hotefo bi:   
Na bɔn´ afi me ho no,   
Mabata  papa nko nko ho;   
Na nea  mεden biara no,   
Mede me ho mama Wo.   
Honhom Kronkron ne me ntra;   
Na mayε hotefo bi:   
Na bɔn´ afi me ho no,

title: N11 “I'm Not Ashamed”
markdown:
**1**   
M'Aw'rade ho nyε m' aniwu,   
Sε migyina ma No;   
Mesɔ N'asεm mu ‘nidi mu   
N'sεnnua ho ‘nuonyam.

 **Nnyeso**   
Dua no ho! Dua no ho!   
Hɔ na me hu hann no   
Na me koma m' adesoa no tew hwee,   
Hɔ na menam gyidi so huu ade,

  **2**   
‘Wura Yesu, me nim ne din –    
Ne din nko na metwer',   
Ɔremma me kra ani nwu,   
Na m'ani da so~ampa.

  **3**   
Ne bɔhyε tim hɔ sε N'agua;   
N'Obetumi ahwε,   
Nea mede mahyε Ne nsa m' no,

  **4**   
Ɔbεbɔ me din tantan no

title: N12 I Will Sing Of The Wondrous
markdown:
**1**   
Mεto Kristo a Owu maam'   
Anwanwasεεm no ho dwom;   
Ɔdan' N'anuonyam fie gyaa hɔ;   
Bεfaa Kalbre ‘sεnnua no!

 **Nnyeso**   
Yiw, mεto Kristo a Owu maam'

Ahwehwεpo ho ato.

  **2**   
Meyerae na Yesu huu me

  **3**   
Mipirae Yesu saam' yare;

  **4**   
Esum nna da so ba me so,   
Metaa fa ‘w'rεhow kwan so,   
Nanso Agyenkwa ka me ho,   
Ɔde Ne nsa ka me dwoo.

title: N13 O Love Divine
markdown:
**1**   
Soro dɔ, dεn na Woyε yi!   
Wodan nipa awu amam'!   
Agya no dɔ Ba koro no   
So-aa me bɔne dua no so!   
Onyame Ba no wu maa me   
Wɔakum me Wura ne Dɔfo.

  **2**   
Wɔakum No ama me ne wo   
De 'tuatefo 'ba Nyame nkyεn;   
Gye di, asεm no yε nokowar‘   
Sε Yesu mogya atɔ yεn;   
Faf'ri Ne mfem' sen sε nsu;   
Wɔakum me Wura ne Dɔfo

  **3**   
Monhwε No, mò a mutwam' nyinaa

Bɔn'yεfo mmεhwε 'Gyenkwa wu,   
Mmisa sε yaw bi te sε 'yi?   
Momma Ne mogya no nnye yεn;   
Wɔakum me Wura ne Dɔfo.

title: N14 There was One who
markdown:
**1**   
Obi de ɔpε sii m´anan mu wu maa me,

ɔde ɔpε faa asεnnua so kwan no so,   
De me bra mu bɔne nyinaa kyεe.

 **Nnyeso**   
Wɔabɔ asεnunm´,   
Wɔabɔ asεnunm´,   
O hwε seneá ɔde ɔpε soae!   
Yaw ne adehwere   
Pii na Yesu de soaa   
Me bɔne kɔɔ asεnnua no so!

  **2**   
Onyaa odwo, adɔe ne boasetɔ maa me,   
N´Oyii me komam´bɔne nyinaa,   
Afobu nni hɔ bio, afei made me ho   
W´ɔabɔ me bɔne nyinaá asεnnuam'.

  **3**   
Metintm m´Agyenkwa den, merennyaw No da;   
Mede dεw betu me kwan daa daa   
Na mede m´ano ne me komá ato dwom sε,   
Wɔayi bɔne afi hɔ kɔ.

title: N15 Man Of Sorrows
markdown:
**1**   
Yaw Nipa, din nwanwa a   
Wɔde frε Nyame  Ba a   
Ɔbεgyee nnebɔn'yεfo   
Haleluya! ɔgyefo ni!

  **2**   
Animguasem' ahiyim'   
N'Osii m'ananmu dii fɔ;   
Manya faf'ri Ne mogyam',   
Haleluya! ɔgyefo ni!

  **3**   
Yedi fɔ, yεn ho wɔ fi;   
Nyame Guammá a Onni dεm;   
Betumi ayε mpata   
Haleluya! ɔgyefo ni!

  **4**   
Wɔsεn' No nti na Owui,   
Na ɔteεε mu sε “Mawui”:   
Wɔama No so ɔsoro;   
Haleluya! ɔgyefo ni!

  **5**   
Anuonyam Hene no ba,   
Bεfa Ne mma kɔ fie a,   
Yεbεto dwom yi bio se:   
Haleluya! ɔgyefo ni!

title: N16 Forever here my
markdown:
**1**   
Ha na mεtra ahome daa,   
Mεbεn Wo mfem' mogyan;   
M'anidaso ne m'asεm ni,   
‘Gyenkwa no wu maa me.

  **2**   
M'Agyenkwa Nyame a Worewu   
Bɔn' ne ‘fodi nsuti,   
Fa Wo mogya pa no guar' me,   
Na ma me ho ntew kronn.

  **3**   
Guar' me na fa me yε Wode;   
Guar' me, na Wowε me;   
Guar' me na me nan ho nko-   
Me nsa, me ti, koma.

  **4**   
Fa Wo mpata mogya no kam',   
Kosi sε gyidi ne   
Anidaso bεsow aba,   
Na me kra bεdan dɔ.

title: N17 Sweet the time
markdown:
**1**   
B're no yε dε boro so!   
B're a 'hotefo hyiam no.   
B're a wɔdwen 'Gyenwa ho,   
Na wohyiam to Ne ho dwom.

  **2**   
Yεto daa ɔdɔ ho dwom,   
Dɔ a εkaa Agya no;   
ɔhwεε wiase mmusu no,   
Dɔɔ wiase de Ne Ba kyεe

  **3**   
Yεto 'Ba no dɔ dwom:   
ɔdan' N'ahenni gyaa s´ro,   
Faa yεn su sii yεn ananm´   
N'Obewui maa yεn nyinaa.

  **4**   
Yεto Honhom dɔ ho dwom;   
ɔne yεn dii ap'rep're   
Maa yaw ne suro kaa yεn,   
Ma yεbεn Agyenkwa no.

  **5**   
B're no bεyε dε mm'roso,   
B're a 'hotefo hyiam s'ro   
Wɔbεdwen Yesu hò ara,   
Wɔbεto Ne ho dwom daa.

title: N18 We Love The Place
markdown:
**1**   
Awurade yεdɔ   
Nea W'anuonyam te hɔ,   
Wo trabea mu dεw no   
Kyεn wiase dεw nyinaa.

  **2**   
Ɛyε m-paebɔ fie   
Nea Wo nkoa hyia mu hɔ;   
Na Wo; Wura, wɔ hɔ;   
Rekyea Wo nguankuw no.

  **3**   
Yεdɔ Nkwa asεm no,   
Nea εma asomdwoe,   
Ap'rep'rem' w'rεkyekye,   
Ne dεw a εnsa da.

  **4**   
Yεbεto dwom fam ha   
W'adɔe pii no ho nti,   
Nso yεpε sε yehu   
S'ro nkonimdi dwom no.

  **5**   
‘W'ra Yesu, ma yεn dom   
Ma yεnnɔ W'bebree ha,   
Na yεahu W'anim s'ro   
Ne ‘treneefo asom.

title: N19 Lord Thy Word Abideth
markdown:
**1**   
‘W'rade, W'asɔm tim hɔ,   
Ɔkyerɔ yɔn nanɔkwan;   
Nea ɔgye asɔmpan';   
Nya hann ne anigye.

  **2**   
Sɔ ‘atamfo bɔn a,   
W'asɔm no hyɔ yɔn den;   
Awerɔkyekyesɔm   
N-kwagye nkrasɔm no.

  **3**   
Ahum tu fa yɔn so,   
Mununkum siw kwan a,   
Ne hann kyerɔ yɔn kwan,   
Ɔhwɔ yɔn kwan so yie.

  **4**   
Hena n'otum' ka dɔw   
Ne ademude a   
Komam' hobrɔasefo   
Nya fi W'asɔm mu no?

  **5**   
Mmɔbrɔhun' asεm a   
Ɔboa ateasefo;   
Nkwasɔm a ɔma nea   
Ɔrewu w'rɔ kyekye.

  **6**   
O anka yɔn nso nhu   
N'adesua kronkron no,   
Nnɔ Wo, nsùro Wo, ‘Wura,   
Na yentwiw mmɔn Wo daa.

title: N20 I am so glad
markdown:
**1**   
M'ani gye sɔ yɔn soro Agya no   
Ka Ne dɔ ho asɔm Ne nwoma mu;   
Nneɔma a mihu wɔ Ky'rɔ Kronkron mu,   
Nea ɔkyɔn so ne sɔ, Yesu dɔɔ me.

 **Nnyeso**   
M'ani gye pii sɔ Yesu dɔ me,   
Yesu dɔ me, Yesu dɔ me,   
M'ani gye pii sɔ Yesu dɔ me,   
Yesu dɔ me, sɔɔ yi.

  **2**   
Sɔ me w'rɔ fi No wɔ ntwɔtwɔdɔ a,   
Nea mekɔ biara ɔda so dɔ me;   
Mesan bɔtɔ Ne dɔ basa no so,   
Bere a mekae sɔ Yesu dɔ me.

  **3**   
Da a mehu Henkɔse' ‘nounyam mu no,   
Sɔ dwom biako mpo na metumi' atoa   
Eyi na ɔbɔyɔ me daa daa dwom   
“O ɔyɔ nwonwa sɔ Yesu dɔ me!”

  **4**   
Yesu dɔ me, minim sɔ medɔ No:   
Ɔdɔ n'ɔkaa No No ma ɔbɔgyee me;   
Yiw ɔdɔ n'ɔma Owuu dua no so:   
O, minim pefee sɔ Yesu dɔ me.

title: N21 Pleasant are Thy Court
markdown:
**1**   
Wo s´ro abangua yε fε,   
Wɔ hann ne dɔ man no mu;   
Wo fam abangua yε fε,   
Bɔne ne yaw man yi mu:   
O ɔdomfo Nyankopɔn,   
Me mu honhom kɔn adɔ   
Ahotefo nkɔmmɔdi   
W´anim hy´rεn ne Wo mayε.

  **2**   
N-hyira ne nnomaa a   
Wokyin Wo mmuka ho hyia;   
N-hyira ne nka a   
Wɔhome Agya kokom´;   
Wɔte sε b´rɔnoma a   
Wannya homebea fam ha:   
Wotum´ san kɔ ´daka nom´,   
Kɔhome wɔ ɔdεw mu.

  **3**   
´Kra ´nigyefo ´yeyi sen   
Wɔ mmusu bon yi mu mpo;   
N-su pue wɔ sare so,   
Mana fi soro yεn wɔn;   
Wonya ´hoɔden tu wɔn kwan,   
Bedu W´ahengua no,   
Hwe Wo nan ase som Wo,   
Sε Wo na Woagye wɔn dwoo.

  **4**   
´Wura, ma ensi me sa:   
Boa me bɔn´ wiase yi mu;   
Fa me sie Wo nkyεn trabea:   
Woyε ´Wia ne akokyεm,   
Mma me koma n-to kwan;   
´Dom ne ´nuonyam fi Wo hɔ,   
O ´Wura, hwie gu me so.

title: N22 Christ Who Came
markdown:
**1**   
Kristo bεgyee me kra nkwa,   
ɔhyεn Yordan ´s´rɔkye mu   
ɔsɔre fii nsu no mu,   
Nyame hyεε Ne Ba no nso;   
Agyenkwa ɔkwanky´rεfo;   
Wɔmmɔm´ asu sε ɔno.   
Wɔmfa s´ro ab´rɔnnma,   
Ne Agya dɔ nne no so

  **2**   
Turom hɔ, yaw ´sorɔkye   
No bu kakaa Ne Kra so;   
Kalbre t´rimɔden duan´ ho   
Na Yesu bewu gyee me,   
Wɔabɔ me ne No ´sεnnuam´   
M´anidaso ne Ne wu;   
Ne nan ase na mete,   
Ne nti asεnnuan´so me

  **3**   
Ɔdaa ɔda fof´ro mu,   
Emu suro nyinaa tui:   
ɔpaee ɔbo pon no mu,   
Anuonyam yε Ne de daa   
Wobesie me Kristo:   
Saa na ɔpε sε meyε-   
Meresɔre nsu no mu,   
Ayε Nyame de fof´ro.

title: N23 O Lord of Heaven
markdown:
**1**   
S'ro asase ne po Wura,   
Ayeyi ne anuonyam wɔW',   
Wo ho dɔ no yεnka no dεn   
Ɔdεεfo pa?

  **2**   
Owia hyεnhyεn, m-frama pa,   
Nnua ne aba yi Wo dɔ ky'rε;   
Sɔ kwab're du a Wowɔ hɔ,   
Ɔdεεfo pa.

  **3**   
Ahotɔ fie, ahoɔden nna,   
Asase so nhyira nyinaa,   
yεdaW' ho ase yiW' ayε,   
Ɔdεεfo pa.

  **4**   
Woankame yεn Wo dɔ Ba no,   
Wi-a-se nti, Wode No kyεe;   
Wuyii Hyirafo no maa kwa   
Ɔdεεfo pa.

  **5**   
Woapɔn kra de bɔne akyε;   
Woama yεn dom, s'ro ‘nidaso,   
Agya dεn na yεmfa mma Wo,   
Ɔdεεfo pa.

title: N24 This is the Day of Rest
markdown:
**1**   
´Yi ne ɔhome da:   
Hyε yεn mmerεwyε den:   
Tɔ Wo bosu nwinwin no gu    
Komá a ab´rε no so

  **2**   
´Yi ne asomdwoe da;

  **2**   
Abofra ketewa yi,   
Wode na ama yεn nnε,   
Fa ne koma yε Wo de,   
Ma onyin mmεyε Wo de.

  **3**   
Fa no sie sε nhwiren,   
Na ompue ne bere mu,   
Fa no so yi Wo tumi,   
Ne W'anuonyam adi.

  **4**   
Ma W'abɔfo nwεn no daa,   
Na ma W'ani nku ne ho;   
Pam bonsam firi ne ho;   
Yi no firi ɔhaw mu.

  **5**   
Dan' W'ani hwε~awofo yi,   
Ma wεnyɔ nea~εsε W'ani;   
Ma wonyi nneyεe pa~adi   
N-kyerε akɔkoaa yi.

title: NG2 Ɔkwadwofo
markdown:
**1**   
Ɔkwadwofo, kɔ tεtea nkyεn, hwε n'akwan,   
Hu nyansa, ɔno, ɔnni  panin ne ɔhwεfo;   
Nanso osiesie n'aduan' ahuhub'rem,   
Ɔboaboa n'aduane ano  twabere mu,   
Wobεda akɔsi da bεn, ɔkwadwofo?

  **2**   
Ɛnnε yε n-kwagye b're ma wo, ‘kwadwofo,   
Yε ntεm bεka yεn ho ma yεnyε ‘dwuma no;   
Ɛnnε ne ɔdom ne nkwagye b're,   
Sɔre, na Agyenkwa Yesu refrε wo   
Wobεda akosi da bεn, ɔkwadwofo?

  **3**   
Abɔfo kronkron no rehwε nea woreyε,   
Ɛyε hu ma wo sε wobεsεe (wo) bere kwa;   
Siesie wo ho na b're bi di w'anim reba.   
Ɛbεyε b're pa ama onipa sifo;   
Ɔdom ne nhyira bεka ‘kyi ana ‘kwadwofo.

  **4**   
Hwε, sεnea b're retwam kɔ hyewhyew, kwadwofo,   
Dεn nti na woda so twεn, ɔkwadwofo;   
B're nni wɔ wo, na woahoahoa wo ho,   
Wo b're ara ni, fa hyε Nyame anuonyam,   
Wobεda akosi da bεn, ɔkwadwofo?

title: NG3 B're Bεn Na Ade Bεkye
markdown:
**1**   
Menim sε da bi ade bεkye,   
‘Fisε ‘sum nni Nyame mma so tumi;   
Yehowa no ara pε mu na,   
‘Sum Duru Ne mma'   
Nanso εyε b're tiaa mu Adesua kεse.

 **Nnyeso**   
B're bεn na ‘de bεkye   
‘Sum akyi na ‘de bεkye   
Sε ‘sum duru yεn twam   
Na mununkum si a   
Yεnim sε hann wɔ   
Mununkum akyi.

  **2**   
‘Sum mu honam aniwa nhu hwee,   
Nanso gyidi aniwa hu Nyame yie;   
Ne hann no yi Ne ho adi,   
‘Sum kεse biara mu;   
Ma Ne mma a wɔtie No   
Yε N'apεde nyinaa.

  **3**   
Yehowa, ma me gyidi aniwa,   
Ma menhu Wo ‘sum kεse b're mu mpo;   
Ma me honhom a mεtumi   
De atwεn Wo nkwagye;   
De atwεn Wo nkwagye;   
Na manya Wo hɔ ade Pa b're pa mu.

title: NG4 Soε Me
markdown:
**1**   
Kanaan kwan so fa yε den,   
Akwanside pii wɔ mu;   
Adesoa biara ma ‘hok'rε,   
Enti soεm' adesoa yi.

 **Nnyeso**   
Soε me Agyenkwa soε me   
(Bɔne adsoam' yε d'ru)   
Bɔne adesoa bi so me   
Mεyε dεn mafa kwan yi so.

  **2**   
Honam nnwuma mu yε d'ru,   
‘Hoɔyaa, ‘bufu ne ɔtan;   
Nea ‘ka ho nyinaa ara so me,   
Dom me soεm' adesua yi.

  **3**   
‘Werεhosεm bi nto ‘yi,   
Wobεka sε Wonni me;   
‘Fisε me nnwuma wɔ nnipa anim,   
Na metɔ sin honhom mu.

  **4**   
Menni kwati kwan biara a,   
Mede bεba Wo nkyεn hɔ;   
Gye sε mefa kwan hiaa yi so,   
Nanso gye sε Wodom me.

title: NG5 Gya Me Kwan Dwoo
markdown:
**1**   
Me b're so' a ma me nkεda komm,   
Na mentwεm Wo bɔ hyε no;   
Sε m'abrabɔ nyinaa to twa a   
Aw'rade, gya me kwan dwoo.

 **Nnyeso**   
Gya me kwan dwoo, gya me kwan dwoo,   
Me b'rε so a gya me kwan   
Yi me f'ri yaredahɔ   mu   
B'rε so' a ma me nkɔda komm.

  **2**   
Me b'rε so' a ma menkɔda komm   
Nyame' aWonim m'awieeε,   
Wo nko na Wonim me nkwa nna   
‘Fisε me kwan hyε Wo nsa.

  **3**   
M'awoda yε bɔne ma me,   
Ayε sum ne aw'rεho,   
Wiase asetena afon' me,   
Nanso me hwε Wo ara.

  **4**   
Ɔbrεguo deε, ma εmpare me,   
Kora me anidaso mu,   
Adekyeeε fεfε no mu   
Nyan me W'anuonyam mu bi.

title: NG6 Nyame W'akwan Dɔɔso
markdown:
**1**   
Nyame, W'akwan dɔɔso,   
‘Dasani biara nhu mu yie,   
Nyame, Wo nnwuma yε hu,   
Ɛhia gyidi nko;   
Ɛyε den ma ɔdasani,   
Sε ɔbεhu W'akwan nyinaa mu;   
Agya, nea mesrε Wo ne sε,   
Ma mennɔ Wo nkutoo.

 **Nnyeso**   
Hena na ɔte sε Wo (Nyame)?   
Hena na ɔte sε Wo (Nyame)?   
Wo na Woka na Woyε,   
Obiara nte sε Wo.

  **2**   
Ɔs'ro ka W'anuonyam,   
Na ewim ky'rε Wo nsa~ano adwuma   
Wiase nyinaa wɔ Wo,   
Ɛyε Wo nko de.   
Hena na ɔne Wo p're adeε?   
Hena na ɔne Wo di asie?   
Ɛyε Wo Nyame nkutoo dea,   
Ɛyε Wo de daa daa.

  **3**   
Obi nkyεm Wo Nyame,   
Hena na ɔnsuro Wo tumidi?   
Aman nyinaa bɔ b'rim,   
Sε wɔte Wo nne a;   
Wo nne ma nifrafo hu ade.   
Mpakye mpo tumi nante   
Ɛnam Wo tumi kεse nti   
Hena na ɔnsuro Wo?

  **4**   
Yɔtee Wo nne akyε,   
Yɔtee bi wε Sinai bepɔ so;   
Suro nti yεantumi Ne Wo ankasa ankyε;   
Wo nne maa agyanom ho popoe   
Nketenkete kitaa wɔn Sε yεansuro   
Wo nne yi a Yεn ho bεpo daakye.

title: NG7 De Bɔnyεni A Ɔte Sε Me
markdown:
**1**   
Debɔn ‘yεni a ɔte sε me   
Nanso Agya no dɔ me;   
Sε Nyame mekae Wo dɔ yi a,   
Na m'ani awu me tirim.   
O Awurade sakra me,   
Na ma menyε nea Wopε.   
Sakra me, sakra me,   
Na menyε Wo de daa.

 **Nnyeso**   
Agya fa me, Agya fa me,   
Fa me fra Wo de mu;   
Sesa me Awurade,   
Sesa me Awurade,   
Mo menyε foforɔ

  **2**   
Mεdi ahurisi Wo din ho,   
Na mani gye W'adɔe ho;   
Mene hwan Awurade, mete ase   
Wɔ saa ahokyere yi mu;   
Wo nsam na me honhom hyε,   
Menni guankɔbea biara;   
Te W'anim kyerε W'akoa,   
Fa W'adɔe gye me nkwa.

  **3**   
Awurde, mma m'anim ngu ase,   
Bre a meda so twere Wo;   
Nhwε m'amumuyε,Awurade   
Ntua me so ka;   
Mentumi nnyina W'abufuo ano   
Mentumi ne Wo nni ako   
Awurade, Awurade   
W'akyi obi nni hɔ

  **4**   
Mεto Awurade adɔe ho nnwom,   
Mεyi Ne din akyerε aman;   
Memma Ne din nyεm' aniwu,   
Mεbɔ no b're a εsε mu   
Menim sε Nyame bε tie me   
Na Wayε nsεnhia ama me   
Me Wura tie, me Wura tie,   
Wo mma teateam frε wo.

title: NG8 Onipa Tiafo
markdown:
**1**   
Dεn na Menyε wo onipa?   
Mmoadoma mpo Mehwε wɔnso,   
Anka wo a Mebɔɔ wo Me nsε so,   
Dεn nti na biribi hia wo?

 **Nnyeso**   
Onipa tiafo, woabɔ Me so ko;   
Onipa, Menyε wo dεn?   
Nyame na ɔse, wo de   
Gye Me di, Onipa kae Me ε

  **2**   
Dεn na Menka nky'rε dasani,   
Mebεε wo, na Mesan gyee wo;   
Womma eyi mpo nsom wo bo,   
Nanso wotan wo Bɔfoε

  **3**   
Wiase yi nni wɔ wo ne Me,   
Ɔdɔ nti na Mebɔɔ wo;   
Meremma no sε Oguamma bio,   
Mεba no anibere so.

  **4**   
Metoo asase yi fapem,   
Onipa, na wowɔ he?   
Mebɔɔ nnua ne nsuo  no   
Na woyε dɔte mu dɔte.

  **5**   
Mabrε wo dodo, onipa   
Medi wo ho abooboo   
Meka no Me koma mu sε,   
Manu Me ho sε Mebɔɔ wo.

  **6**   
Nanso Medɔ wo onipa,   
Wo wuo nyε Me fε;   
Wotie Me nne a Mεgye wo,   
Mεyε wo awaawaatuu.

title: NG9 Ɛnam Ne Honhom So
markdown:
**1**   
Wo honhom Wo(Nyame)   
Honhom na yehia   
Nyame honhom Kronkron no.   
Wo honhom, Wo (Nyame)   
Honhom yεsrεW'   
Ma W'honhom no mmεhyε yεn ma.   
Wo honhom no mmεhyε yεn ma.   
Wo honhom no n'εbεboa ma yεahu Yesu yie;

 **Nnyeso**   
Wo honhom no n'εbεboa ma yεadi W'ahyεde so,   
Ɔkwankyerεfo, ɔkwankyerεfo,   
Okyigyinafo no wɔ he   
Akwantuo yi mu  hia   
Wo honhom no yie.

  **2**   
Wo honhom Wo (Nyame)   
Honhom Nyame mu   
Asetra nti yehia no.   
Wo honhom, Wo (Nyame)   
Honhom, wiase   
Nsεmma nsεmma nti yehia Wo.   
Wo honhom no n'εbεboa ma   
Yεanya abrabɔ pa

  **3**   
Wo honhom, Wo (Nyame)   
Honhom n'εbεhyε   
Yεn den ɔbra kwantu'i mu   
Wo honhom, Wo  (Nyame) honhom   
N'εbεkanyan yεn, yεn   
Nyamesom mu,   
Wo honhom no n'εbεka yεn ama   
Yεasom Wo daa;   
εnyε ‘hoɔden so, εnyε tumi so, n;   
'εbεma yεadi nkonim,   
Wo honhom so Awurade Honhom   
Kronkron no.

title: NG10 Medan Wo
markdown:
**1**   
Mede me ho  nyinaa bεma Wo Aw'urade   
Mede me ho nyinaa bεma Wo Agyenkwa' e   
Mede me ho nyinaa bεma Wo Aw'rade   
Medan Wo medan Wo medan Wo' ara.

  **2**   
Nea mεyε nyinaa Wo na WobεyεAma me' o   
Nea mεka nyinaa Wo na Wobεka'Ama me' o   
Mede me ho nyinaa bεma Wo Aw'rade   
Medan Wo, medan Wo,medan Wo' ara.

  **3**   
Gye me, Agya'e, gye me, gye me,   
Gye me na mayera'o Yi me,   
Agya'e yi me f'ri bɔne mu' o Twe me,   
Agya'e, twe me, twe me Bata Wo ho   
Me dan Wo, medan wo, medan Wo' ara.

title: NG11 Sesa Me
markdown:
**1**   
Sesa me, Agya'e, sesa me' o,   
Sesa me' o, sesa me' o,   
Sesa me, Agya'e, sesa me' o   
Sesa me'o, sesa me'o;   
Bubu me koma bɔne yi   
Sesa me, Agya' e sesa me' o,   
Maba W'anim nnε, sesa me,   
Me W'ra e, sesa me'o,   
Sesa me Agya'e sesa me' o,   
Ma me din foforo.   
Maba W'anim nnε, sesa me,   
Me W'ra'e, sesa me' o   
Sesa me Agya'e sesa me' o,   
Fa me bɔne kyε me'o.

  **2**   
Sakra me, Agya'e, sakra me' o,   
Sakra me' o, sakra me' o,   
Sakra me, Agya'e, sakra me' o   
Sakra me'o, sakra me'o;   
Bubu me koma bɔne yi   
Sakra me, Agya' e sakra me' o,   
Maba W'anim nnε, sakra me,   
Me W'ra e, sakra me'o,   
Sakra me Agya'e sakra me' o,   
Ma me din foforo.   
Maba W'anim nnε, sakra me,   
Me W'ra'e, sakra me' o   
Sakra me Agya'e sakra me' o,   
Fa me bɔne kyε me'o.

title: NG12 Ma Yεn Ɔdɔ
markdown:
**1**   
Ma yεn ɔdɔ, Yesu' e, ma yεn ɔdɔ,   
Ma yεn ɔdɔ Yesu' e, Ma yεn ɔdɔ,   
W'adwumadi yε den, yehia ɔdɔ nko' ara   
Sε 'bεyε yie a, gye sε ɔdɔ,   
W'adwum'a'I so, ma yεn ɔdɔ,   
Ma yεn ɔdɔ, Yesu' e, ma yεn ɔdɔ.

  **2**   
Ma y'abot'rε, Yesu' e, ma yεn y'abotrε,   
Ma y'abot'rε Yesu'e, Ma y'abot'rε,   
W'adwumadi yε den, yehia abot'rε Nko' ara   
Sε ‘bεyε yie a, gye sε abot'rε,   
W'adwum'a'i so,ma y'abot'rε,   
Ma y'abot'rε, Yesu' e, ma y'abot'rε.

  **3**   
Ma y'asomdwoe, Yesu' e, ma y'asomdwoe   
Ma y'asomdwoe Yesu' e, Ma y'asomdwoe,   
W'adwumadi yε den, yehia somdwo Nko' ara   
Sε ‘bεyε yie a, gye sε somdwoe,      
W'adwum'a'I so, ma y'asomdwoe,   
Ma y'asomdwoe, Yesu' e, ma y'asomdwoe.

title: NG13 Mehwε Nyame
markdown:
**1**   
O m’abrabɔ mu nsεm yε Awerεho   
Nanso Onyame nti mempa aba;    
Nea εbεsi biara mepε   
Menim sε b’re pa bεba.

 **Nnyeso**   
Mehwε Nyame, mehwε Nyame,   
Mεsu mafrε me Nyame daa nyinaa;   
Mεgyina pintinn, mempa ab da;   
ɔbrε biara akyi wɔ ‘home.

  **2**   
Sε esum duru me kwan mu,   
Na mede me ti pempem;   
B’re’ a m’anidaso nyinaa asa’a,   
Mede bεhyε Nyame nsa

  **3**   
Sε akwantu yi mu yε den mpo,   
Na menni werε kyekyefo a,   
B’re a awɔse bɔne akye me no,   
Onyame bεhyε me den

  **4**   
Awerεho ne su yi to bεtwa,   
Efisε Nyame bεdi ama me;   
B’re a meto m’ani a εnsia no   
Metoa Agyenkwa mpaebɔ mu.

title: NG14 Sɔ Me Mu
markdown:
**1**   
M’Ayenkwa pa Yesu,   
Kae me m’akwantu yim’,   
Menni ‘wirεkyekyefo bi   
Sε Wo nko b’re a menam yi’   
Ɔbra kwan yi so de,   
Me nko mentumi mfa so (sɔ me mu)

 **Nnyeso**   
M’Ayenkwa pa Yesu,   
Kae me m’akwantu yim’,   
Menni ‘wirεkyekyefo bi   
Sε Wo nko b’re a menam yi’   
Ɔbra kwan yi so de,   
Me nko mentumi mfa so (sɔ me mu)

  **2**   
Mεhwε m’anim ara,   
Mεkɔ m’anim tee;   
Nea mesrε Wo ne sε,   
Ma menn’ru ‘kwantu yi awiei,   
Anka mεda W’ase   
Akamfo Wo din kronkron.

  **3**   
Menim, Woka me ho,   
Me bo rentu da;   
Sε ‘bonsam de haw ny’naa   
Ba me so a me bo rentu da;   
Me mpaebɔ ara ne sε:   
Nyame, ma εnsi me yie.

  **4**   
M’aw’rεkyekye Nyame, Me Hann ne me Nkwagye;   
Mesrε Wo Agya pa,   
Hyerεn di m’anim kyerε me kwan,   
Nea menam biara no,   
Mesrε, Agya, di m’anim kan.

  **5**   
Atamfo ani hwε,   
As’refo repε as’re;   
Fεwdifo nso retwεn,   
Nanso menim sε wɔbεfεre;   
‘Fisε menim sε me   
Dimafo Nyame te ase daa.

  **6**   
Sε m’akwantu yi   
Bεsi me yie a,   
Sε mede nkonimdi   
Bεkɔ fie a ne nyinaa firi Wo;   
Ao me Nkwagye Nyame   
Kae me ma εnsi me yie

title: NG15 Kan’ Na Meyε ‘Ninfrani
markdown:
**1**   
Kan’ na meyε ‘nifrani nanso nnε m’ani abue,   
Kristo mogya dehye no agye me;   
Sε mehwε me Gyefo sε   
Ɔsεn mmemudua no ho   
Na mogya refi N’ak’rum’ sen no a,   
Mede me ho ma Nokoraa sε afɔre~a εsɔ ani,   
Ɔdɔ bεn ni? Ɔdɔ bi nte sε Kristo dɔ!

  **2**   
‘Wura Yesu, afei de ky’rε me nea menyε mmaW’,   
Mayε komm rehwehwε Wo akyi kwan;   
Sε mete~ase~a mete maW’,   
Sε mewu mpo~a mewu maW’,   
Kosi sε Wobepue W’ahenni no mu;   
‘Fisε Woayε bi~ama me,   
Merentumi nna W’ase,   
Wura Yesu, afei de fa me, fa me koraa.

  **3**   
Wo a Woyε Nyame Ba nso Wowu maa bɔn’yεfo;   
Me bɔne  nti wɔbɔɔ Wo asεnduam’.   
Wɔyεε Wo ayayade,   
Wɔtee Wo so n-tasu,   
Ne nyinaa ‘kyi wɔbɔɔ Wo asεnuam’;   
Eyi nyinaa Woampa~aba, Wo dɔ no nti Wokaa sε,   
“Fa firi wɔn, Agya, wɔnnim nea wɔreyε.”

title: NG16 Mεyi Me Gyefo Ayε
markdown:
**1**   
Mεyi me gyefo ayε, Monnyae me o   
Mma mensεpε me ho, mento   
Dwom nyi Nyame ayε o.   
Mede sanku, nnawuta; mεkanfo No o;   
Menim mea menya wɔ Ne mu, Monnyae me o.

 **Nnyeso**   
Mεto dwom!, mεto dwom ayi me   
Nyame ayε daa;   
Mεto dwom!, mεto dwom ada me   
Nyame ase daa;   
Menim nea menya wɔ Ne mu,   
Monnyae me o.

  **2**   
Mεto me dɔfo ho dwon, monnyae me o;   
Jessus din, mεbɔ ama amansan Ate o.   
Mede sanku, nnawuta; mεkanfo No o;   
Menim nea menya wɔ Ne mu, Monnyae me o.

  **3**   
Mεda me Bɔfo ase, monnyae me o   
Mma mensεpε me ho, mento dwom nna   
Nyame ase o. Mede mpaebɔ, abot’rε; mεsom No o;   
Menim nea menya wɔ Ne mu Monnyae me o.

title: NG17 Agya Bεhwε
markdown:
**1**   
Agya bεhwε, Agya bεka,   
Me Nyame bεdi ama me o;   
Nyame a ɔntɔ nko, ɔnna   
Dabiara da o;   
Agya bεhwε, Agya bεka,   
Me Nyame bεdi ama me o;   
Metwere No a,metwere ɔbotan   
M’anim ngu ase ara da o.

 **Nnyeso**   
Sε asεm bi to me a;   
Me Nyame bεdi ama me o;   
Sε ɔko ba me so a,   
Me Nyame bɔko agye me o.   
Ɔbεka ama me, ɔbεdi ama me,   
Ɔbεko agye me nti mensuro hwee.   
Agya bεhwε, Agya bεka,   
M Nyame bεdi ama me o   
Metwere No a, metwere ɔbotan   
M’anim ngu ase ara da o.

  **2**   
Nyame no ara, me bɔfo no,   
Yehowa wɔ hɔ ma me o   
Me dɔfo Yesu, ɔmpa m’akyi ara da o   
Nyame no ara,me bɔfo no   
Yehowa wɔ hɔ ma me o   
Ɔnim me fi y’afun’ mu   
Ansa na wɔ woo me o.

title: NG18 Sε Owia Hyerεn
markdown:
**1**   
Sε owia hyerεn anopa,   
Ne ɔsram, nsoroma ‘nadwo.   
Saa na ofie hy’rεn baabiara;   
Ɔbra’ a εte apɔ mu.

 **Nnyeso**   
‘Genkwa Hy’rafo, hyε yεn ma,   
Ma esum no nkɔ aky’ri.   
Ma ‘wia hyerεn a efi fie   
Nhy’rεn baabiara a yεbεfa

  **2**   
‘Somdwoe wɔ ofie biara a,   
Yesu ho anigye wɔm’   
B’re a ɔhaw aba hɔ no,   
Ɔma akoma tɔ yam.

  **3**   
‘Gyenkwa, si mmofra yare kwan;   
Na bɔ yεn nyinaa ho ban.   
Fa Nyame dɔ hann no hyε yεn   
Afie  mu abrabɔ ma.

  **4**   
Agyenkwa, ma yεn nkonimdi;   
Honhom ma ‘dɔ, asomdwoe   
Nyame anounyam mmra yεn fie,   
Na yεn anigye ansa.

title: NG19 Oyame Yεda Woase
markdown:
**1**   
Onyame yεda W’ase,   
Woama mfenhyia pii ato yεn;   
Ghana S.D.A. Asafo,   
Momma yεn nyinaa mmɔ ‘se.

 **Nnyeso**   
Haleluya, mommɔ se,   
Ose ye, aye aye.   
Haleluya, Mommɔ se,   
Akwanhwεfo mommɔ se

  **2**   
Onyame yeyi W’ayε,   
Woama ‘somwoe pii aka yεn.   
W’asafo anya nkɔso pii,   
Ama Wo mma ‘di nkonim.

  **3**   
Onyame yεbεsom Wo,   
Wotumi abɔ yεn ho ban.   
Yεbεhim nkonimdi frankaa,   
Wɔ sika mpoano hɔ bi.

  **4**   
Onyame yεretwεn Wo,   
Fa W’anuonyam kata yεn so   
Fa Wo honhom no hyε yεn den,   
Kosi sε Kristo bepue.

title: NG20 So Mεhu Sika ‘Sase
markdown:
**1**   
So mehu sika ‘sase’ a   
Woasiesie ‘ma hotefo   
Anuonyam ‘sase a εhyerεn,   
Na Yesu yε hann nom?

 **Nnyeso**   
Merekɔ fie, Yiw, nɔdεw fie   
W’ra yεm’ nokwafo   
Kod’ru sika man nom’?      


  **2**   
Na mentumi nte ase   
Sε metum’ atw’re Yesu;   
Afei mahu sε metw’re No a   
Obεdi m’anim daa.

  **3**   
Sε ɔbra mu yε den a,   
Kristo ma mentum’ nyε den.   
Ahobrεasem’ gyinaW’ bɔhyε so   
Kodu W’ahemfie hɔ.

  **4**   
Ahenkyεw bi retwεn me   
Wɔ kuro fεfε no mu;   
Mede dɔ yε nea mentumi a   
Me ne No bεtraa daa.
